description: PATCO's website is horrible for looking up train schedules and departure times; they make you download a PDF just to view timings. This is a handy PATCO schedule app that lists train departures for any given station, at any given day, in either direction. Where's my train?? So if you've ever found yourself waiting and waiting for that train, wondering why it isn't here yet, or if you're just looking to plan your trip better, this app is a must.
release_text: ** UPDATE: Code changes to parse and list special schedules due to PATCO's website change. ** Also added ability to download special schedules (PDF viewer required). V1.0 Initial Release V1.1 Automatically save station, direction and day selections V1.2 Show closest departure time to current time. V1.3 Added Twitter feed to app.

description: 結合GPS定位，讓您經由行動裝置看屋零距離，透過指尖滑動輕移，輕鬆尋屋看透透，不管是現場實景、房屋資訊、房市新聞或成交行情，滿足您對買屋租屋與掌握市場脈動的需求。功能簡介如下： 一、功能完整 包含GPS定位、買屋、租屋搜尋、地圖查詢、成交行情查詢、門市據點查詢、貸款增值稅試算、新聞訊息、收藏最愛、QRcode以及留言預約系統等功能，透過太平洋房屋行動app，讓您更多一項不必出門也可以尋得理想房屋與獲得服務資訊的利器。 二、定位尋屋、即時聯絡 透過GPS定位，在您身旁的待售待租房屋資訊及環境一目瞭然，此外搭配地圖、鄰近成交行情及房貸試算，讓你對於房屋資訊充份掌握，再以指尖輕觸遍佈各地的太平洋房屋服務據點電話，聯絡太平洋房屋的營業人員為您諮詢服務。也可以電子郵件與門市聯絡，暢通溝通管道。 三、典藏最愛、簡單便利 運用收藏功能，不管買屋或租屋，都可以將你注目的房屋列為最愛，任何最新變動都在你彈指之間完全掌握。並可以隨時新增刪除，隨時更新最愛。 四、最新成交行情與新聞資訊 與企業網站同步更新成交行情與房市動態，讓您在彈指之間迅速瞭解行情與新聞，為您在買屋賣屋租屋的重要時刻，提供即時的協助資訊。 太平洋房屋 客戶服務專線0800211815 (點選號碼直接由手機撥出電話，平板則無此功能) 客戶服務信箱 service@pacific.com.tw (點選信箱後即帶出電子郵件提供書寫信函)

developer: Radio Thermostat Company of America, Inc
description: The official app for controlling Radio Thermostat, 3M Filtrete, AirWaves, and Current Innovations Wi-Fi Thermostats. Control your Radio Thermostat Wi-Fi enabled thermostat from anywhere using your Android-powered device. Sign in with your Radio Thermostat username and password for on-the-go thermostat control and energy savings. With the app you can: * View the temperature inside your home * Set up and edit your schedule * Monitor and adjust your Target Temperature * Set your home to energy-saving Away mode * Automatically trigger energy-saving Away mode based on phone location * Switch modes between Heat, Cool, Auto, and Off * Monitor your HVAC system's performance * Adjust your fan to On, Auto, or Circulate * Control multiple thermostats in different locations * Install home screen App Widgets for quick thermostat and location info Don't have a Radio Thermostat Company of America Wi-Fi thermostat? Purchase one at www.radiothermostat.com or at The Home Depot. According to the EPA, using a programmable thermostat can reduce your energy bills by an average of $180 per year. Radio Thermostat’s products allow you to stay comfortable when you are home, save money when you are not, and have greater control over your home’s heating and cooling system. For more information, visit www.radiothermostat.com.

description: Reverse Gravity is a physics based puzzle game for android phones and tablets. Guide your ball by drawing lines and reversing gravity and collect all the gems on screen. Change, mix and manipulate your colour to hit special gems. A higher score is awarded for reversing gravity as little as possible. With 4 worlds and 36 levels Reverse Gravity is the best way to kill time,avoid awkward social situations and anything in between. Email us any questions, concerns or ideas, we'd love to hear them.

Check out this popular Chinese Mahjong game featuring wild African animals suitable for all ages. Mahjong games (sometimes also called Mah-jongg or Mahjongg) came from China and are greatly popular all over the world. Your task is to clear the playfield by finding the two stones with the same symbol – the same animal. Match two identical tiles that are not blocked from the right or from the left. If you can’t select the tile, then it’s blocked. When you make a match two tiles will be removed. If you like traditional Chinese games, try out this one. We are sure you will love it. The game main advantages: - Simple rules; - Addictive gameplay; - Impressive quality artstyle; - Graphics are polished and pleasing to the eyes. - Melodic music and nice sound effects; - Cool relaxing game

Trial version of "Hand Massage: Acupressure" with reduced alignment listings. *** OVER 10,000 DOWNLOADS **** Improve health with simple hand massage. This app takes you through the use of Chinese Acupressure to improve health and relieve minor alignments. Hand Acupressure is simple and can be performed on the go, taking only a matter of minutes throughout your day. NOTE: This app require the official Adobe AIR app to be installed on your mobile to run. WARNING: DO NOT USE during pregnancy. Acupressure SHOULD NOT be used to substitute professional medical advice or medical treatment. If you are seriously injured or have persistent symptoms seek medical aid immediately. Acupressure Points to help -Ankle Pain -Common Cold / Fever -Constipation -Cough -Chesty Cough -Diarrhea -Ear ache -Elbow Pain -Flatulence / Gas -Headache -Heartburn -Heart Burn -Hip Pain -Indigestion -Knee Pain -Lowerback Pain -Nausea / Vomitting -Neck Pain -Restlessness -Runny Nose -Shoulder Pain -Sore Throat -Sore / Tired Eyes -Stuffy Nose -Tiredness -Toothache -Upperback Stiffness What can this app do for you? This application is design to help it's users learn how to relieve minor alignments by massaging specific locations on their hands. Hand Massage Acupressure is simple, convenient and effective. What is Acupressure Acupressure is a Traditional Chinese Medicine method of manually applying pressure on to specific points on the body to help achieve certain health benefits such as pain and tension relief. How does Acupressure work? In traditional Chinese medicine, it is believed that our body has vital energy known as Qi or Chi that flows throughout the body along paths that are known as along the Meridians. When the meridians are blocked or disrupted the body will start to develop ailments and illnesses. Acupressure and Acupuncture stimulates the Meridians to help the body regain balance and assume the healthy flow of energy. If you have any issue with the app pleaser let us know at: hi@acupressureapp.com Full version of the app is available at: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.HandMassageFull

Kendo sword-fight. Swipe to block opponent. Tap to score. Proceeds from sales benefit the Japanese Bilingual/Bicultural Program (JBBP) at Rosa Parks Elementary School in San Francisco. Realistic sound effects put you in the spirit of the Kendo 剣道, meaning "Way of The Sword", a modern Japanese martial art of sword-fighting descended from traditional swordsmanship (kenjutsu) which originated with the samurai class of feudal Japan. Hi children learning alphabet is both very easy and very enjoyable now. In this game which is prepared free, there are 26 letter for you to colour illustrated with various of pictures. For example, the letter “P” is prepared with its small and big types on the same page with “Princess” and “Police” pictures. You will both recognize letters and learn two words on the page which start with that letter. And you will know the objects by colouring the samples which we prepared for you. You can listen the letters and names of the objects on that page by clicking on the sound icon on the toolbar. You can do detailed painting with rich toolbar menu as long as you like in this game. You can reach 3D and realistic resultswithout missing out any details by using the qualities of zooming in the painting and fixing brush size or its clarity options . Thanks to these qualities if you want, you can make up to the princesses by using zooming in section. When you do mistakes or don’t like the result, you can refit by using undo section. You can undo for 25 times at the most. You can load finished paintings to social web like Whatsapp, Facebook, Google Drive, Chat Onand share with people you love. At the time of selecting colours without needing any particular palette, you can see all light and dark tints of colours on the screen. While you are choosing a picture to paint, you will see an empty page at the end. We left this page for you to use it like a painting notebook. You can paint that page as you want and share it with people you love. Painting games hepls you children to develop mental and colour evolution and it provides you to learn objects better. Our request from parents is to direct their children to draw on both papers and virtually to develop their mental and muscle coordination. General Features of the Game: - Useful thematic design. - Painting with brush. - Painting with pencils. - Resizing pencils, brushes or rubbers. - Undoing and advancing sections. - Detailed colour choosing from the colour palette. - Rubber function. - Cleaning the whole screen function. - Sharing the painted picture on social web. - Possibility of saving pictures to the gallery. - Possibility of zooming in or out the pictures.

La aplicación de imágenes de amor permite ir visualizando las imágenes para terminar seleccionando la que más nos guste y añadirle finalmente si queremos un texto que tú mismo quieras crear o seleccionar alguna de las frases que vienen ya con la aplicación. Una vez creada nuestra imágen de amor podremos compartirla con alguno de nuestros contactos o en algún grupo sorprendiéndolos gratamente. Lo más común será que utilices las creaciones realizadas con esta estupenda aplicación para sorprender a tu pareja o esa persona que tanto te gusta. Además de en WhatsApp, podremos compartir nuestras imágenes a través de otros servicios de mensajería como Telgram, Line y similares además de las redes sociales de siempre como Facebook y Twitter. The application allows images of love images scroll to finish selecting the ones you like and finally add a text if we want to create it yourself or choose one of the phrases that come with the application. Note that all the images of love and have the right to make them look great in WhatsApp properly size and not like other similar apps showing distorted images.

description: Главное преимущество нашего приложения в том, что пользоваться им удобно, быстро и просто. Оно хорошо подходит как для студентов, школьников, так и для простого составления списка дел на день или неделю. Простота в том, что отсутствуют лишние функции. Пользователю предлагается выбрать фон, настроить стиль, размер и цвет шрифта. При включении автоматически открывается сегодняшний день. Таким образом, можно просмотреть расписание буквально в один клик. Есть базовая разметка на восемь пунктов, которую можно редактировать или совсем удалить. Интерфейс интуитивно простой, что опять же обеспечивает простоту и удобство в использовании. The main advantage of our application that use it conveniently, quickly and easily. It is well-suited for students, and for the preparation of simple to-do list for the day or week. Simplicity that there are no extra features. User is prompted to select the background, customize style, font size and color. When you turn on automatically opens today. Thus, you can view the schedule just a click. Is the basic layout for eight points, which can be edited or removed entirely. Intuitively simple interface, which again provides simplicity and ease of use.

NOTE! This is the specialized SOLITON1 version for electric cars. If you are looking for just Speedometer, KPH, MPH, Lat-G, Acceleration, GPS Info then download our other app - "Sub Speedo" Use with Google Maps tracking view and speedometer at the same time! Map includes Foursquare search to find and discover local amenities Swipe, long click and menu to configure screens. Tap to get current reading. Resize gauges to suit screen. New version coming soon with even more options (Email me if want to be a beta tester esp. if you have a Zilla controller).

description: The official mobile app of tennis’ year-ending Barclays ATP World Tour Finals, comprising only the world’s best eight qualified singles players and doubles teams, features point-by-point live scores and match statistics, a live blog and twice-daily live talk TV show, video & photos, match reports, schedule, group standings, event guide with transportation information and more. It’s your essential on-the-go tool for the world’s biggest indoor tennis tournament, featuring the likes of Novak Djokovic, Roger Federer and Andy Murray, who will play a minimum of three matches each at The O2 in London.

description: Find the best month to travel for a determined city around the world: - Climatology from more than 2.600.000 cities around the world - Search a good weather for: Travel, Marriage, Wind Sports, Mountain Sports, Beach, Fishing - Search the best month for Cold and dry weather - Search the best month for Hot and dry weather - Metric and US system units - Languages English, Portuguese, Spanish, French, German - 30 years of climatological data - Full Data for Temperature (Min, Max, Med), Precipitation, Wind Speed, Cloud Cover and Solar Radiation. Tested: Nexus S Works: 1.5 or higher Suggestions: We will apply all good suggestions. So send yours as quick as possible. If you want other weather type search, or you need to add a city in our data bank, we will apply the changes asap.

Requirements   This is a Keyboard Skin / theme, NOT  an actual Keyboard. You will need to have a supported keyboard application (see below) in order to apply this skin to your keyboard. Supported Keyboard Applications   • Smart Keyboard (Trial or Pro) • Perfect Keyboard (Pro version only) • Kii Keyboard • Ultra Keyboard • Super Keyboard • TSwipe-Pro Keyboard • May work for other keyboards but this is not guaranteed. Installation Instructions 1. First, make sure you have installed one of the supported keyboard applications that are listed above. 2. Next go to your device's settings and select Language & input. 3. Check the box next to the keyboard application you have installed. 4. Change the Input method to the keyboard app you have downloaded. 5. Go the settings of the keyboard app you have downloaded and change the skin (see first screenshot). Theme Details This keyboard skin features a black and green skin with a bright green . Perfect for users of black and green themes and dark skins. This is an HD keyboard skin will work great on phone devices and tablet devices! Support Please email us at stealthychief@gmail.com if you have any questions regarding this keyboard skin and we'll be happy to help!

This application is a simple, bare bones dice roller for use with tabletop RPGs. It is ideal for users who are looking for a fast and efficient way to roll a variety of RPG dice types. The user selects how many dice to throw, up to 10, and then chooses the number of sides per die. Currently, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, and 20 sided dice are supported. When the dice are rolled the screen displays the value of each die thrown, as well as the total sum. I am new to android development, and with this being my first application I would love to hear your feedback on how this or future applications could be improved.

This game is extremely addictive, probably the most played of the bubble shooting games. description: «Большой» — это единственный в Беларуси полноценный городской журнал. «Большой» гармонично сочетает в себе два издательских сегмента: lifestyle magazine & alternative city paper. Первая часть — колонки, интервью и большие материалы — тексты лучших журналистов и фотоистории о самых важных тенденциях, проблемах, процессах, изменениях в жизни города. Вторая часть — рубрики «география», «здоровье», «дети», «путешествия», «еда», «авто», «афиша» — посвящена практической информации для жизни в Минске. «Большой» — это также: Лучшие фотографы Беларуси Лучшие авторы Опытная команда «Большой» — это не гид по городу и не афиша. Это журнал о городе как живой субстанции, о людях и интересах этого города. "Large" - it is the only city in Belarus, full magazine. "Large" combines the two publishing segment: lifestyle magazine & alternative city paper. The first part - columns, interviews and great materials - texts of the best journalists and photo stories about the most important trends, issues, processes, changes in the life of the city. The second part - heading "geography", "health", "children", "travel", "food", "auto", "billboard" - is devoted to practical information for living in Minsk. "Large" - it's also: Best photographers Belarus Top Authors An experienced team   "Big" - is not a guide to the city and not the poster. This journal is about the city as a living substance, and the interests of the people of this city.

The popular memory matrix game has been ported to Android. Exercise your Spatial Recall and Working Memory with this fun game. Correctly repeat the pattern that briefly appears on the matrix to move on to harder levels. Complete the higher levels for increased points. Mental addiction guaranteed!

description: Enjoy 8 free dictionaries from www.diccionaris.cat. Search definitions in Catalan and translations to English, French and Spanish. All you need to read and speak Catalan in your pocket. Guaranteed content by the most renowned dictionary publishers Larousse and Vox.

PSYCHOSOMAT (BETA-Version) Eine brandneue App zur Unterstützung von Patienten während und nach der Psychotherapie sowie bei Selbstfindungsprozessen. Psychosomat ist eine App von Patienten für Patienten. Sie wurde nach umfangreichem Studium professioneller Literatur sowie in Rücksprache mit Patienten in psychosomatischer Behandlung entworfen. Die App unterstützt Sie in dem langwierigen und oft anstrengenden Prozess der Selbstanalyse. Die Funktionen von Psychosomat ersetzen eine Reihe von in der Psychotherapie gängigen Fragebögen. In der Psychotherapie ist der Beginn zumeist dadurch geprägt, dass man sich, seine Gefühle und Reaktionen kennenlernt bevor man an eine Veränderung gehen kann. Dazu ist eine intensive Beobachtung und Protokollierung der aufkommenden Gefühle und Verhaltensweisen notwendig. - Wann reagiere ich wie? - Warum reagiere ich so? - Was macht dies mit mir? - Was will ich ändern? - Greifen die erarbeiteten Veränderungen? Mit Hilfe dieser App können Sie Ihre Erkenntnisse notieren, reflektieren und gegebenenfalls mit Ihrer/m Therapeutin/en oder Psychologin/en besprechen. Bei Rückfragen zu den einzelnen Begriffen sei auf die Therapie oder entsprechende Fachliteratur verwiesen. Die App erhebt nicht den Anspruch, diese zu ersetzen. Features: - Protokollierung von Stimmung, Anspannung, Angst, Panik, Suizidgedanken, Erschöpfung, Suchtdruck, Grübelzwang, Schlafstörungen und Appetit - Schemata, Muster, Modi, Lebensfallen - Fertigkeiten / Skills - Gefühle - Positive und negative Ereignisse - Aktivitäten - Grafische Darstellung der Verläufe - Alter / neuer Weg - Stärken und Schwächen - Radikale Akzeptanz - Berichte - Hoch- und Querformat - Werbefrei Datenschutz: - Diese App ist nicht imstande, von alleine ("heimlich") Daten weiterzugeben! - Es werden vom Autor keine persönlichen Daten gesammelt, auch nicht zu statistischen Zwecken. Eine Besonderheit bildet der Kaufprozess über Google Play und die Datenerhebung durch Google. Haftungsausschluss: - Dies ist eine BETA-Version Momentan befindet sich die Software noch in einem Prüfverfahren und es sind noch nicht alle Funktionen implementiert. Bitte nutzen Sie die Gelegenheit und Teilen Sie Ihre Erfahrungen oder Verbesserungsvorschläge mit dem Autor. Kontakt: mail@christian-brecht.de - Die persönliche Bitte des Autors ist es, dass Sie während der Testphase bei Fehlern in der Software keine negativen Bewertungen über Google Play / Google+ einstellen. Nutzen Sie stattdessen bitte die oben beschriebene Möglichkeit zum Kontaktieren des Autors. - Der Autor behandelt Ihre Daten und Fragen stets vertraulich, eine Weitergabe an Dritte wird ausgeschlossen. Erweiterte Suchbegriffe: Depression, Manie, Burnout, Angst, Borderline, Therapie, Schematherapie, Verhaltenstherapie, Psychotherapie, Psychosomatik, Psychologie PSYCHOSOMAT (BETA version) A brand new app for the support of patients during and after psychotherapy as well as in self-discovery processes. Psychosomat is an app by patients for patients. It was designed with patients in psychosomatic treatment after extensive study of professional literature and in consultation. The app will help you in the long and often arduous process of self-analysis. The functions of Psychosomat replace a number of popular in psychotherapy questionnaires. In psychotherapy, the onset is usually shaped by the fact that, his feelings and reactions gets to know before you can go to a change. To this end, an intensive observation and recording of the emerging feelings and behaviors is necessary. - When I react like? - Why do I react this way? - What does this with me? - What I want to change? - Reaching the developed changes? With the help of this app, you can record your findings, reflect and, where appropriate, with your / therapist m / s or psychologist to discuss / s. Reference is made to the therapy or specialized literature any questions about the individual terms. The app does not claim to replace them. Features: - Logging of mood, tension, anxiety, panic, suicidal thoughts, fatigue, cravings, obsessive brooding, sleep and appetite - Schemes, patterns, modes, life traps - Skills / Skills - Feelings - Positive and negative events - Activities - Graphical representation of the curve - Age / new way - Strengths and Weaknesses - Radical Acceptance - Reports - Portrait and landscape format - Ad-Free Privacy Policy: - This app is not able ("secretly") to pass data from alone! - There will be collected by the author, no personal data, even for statistical purposes. description: Have you ever changed your phone and you could not retrieve the phone number of all your contacts? or have you lost your mobile or cell phone has been stolen and you had to enter contacts numbers manually? With Easy Backup Contacts you can fix this problem. Other applications store contacts on the PC, but what happens if the PC is broken or changed? This application allows you to retrieve and store contact data in a database on the Internet for recovery in other mobile phone with Android system. So you can retrieve all contacts quickly and easily in case of theft or loss of the terminal. Just put your contact number and password and save. When you want to recover your contacts simply have to put your phone number and password and retrieve.

Connect with your favorite people right on your lock screen. Leave notes, drawings and photos for them to see when they switch on their phones. LokLok is in Beta. By becoming a Beta tester we invite you to help us improve LokLok. Send us your feedback and suggestions, we want to hear from you! HOW IT WORKS: LokLok replaces your standard lock screen with a shared white board that is always in sync between you and whoever you are connected to. Create a group with one or more people and whenever someone changes his/her lock screen it’ll be automatically updated on everyone else’s. WHAT’S SO COOL ABOUT IT: • Grab your phone and start drawing without unlocking it • Leave a note for others, it’s the first thing they’ll see when they reach for their phone • Use it with your significant other or a group of close friends and stay in touch throughout the day • Works like a white board, erase what’s there or draw over it • Take a photo to put on your friend’s screen and draw over the photos they take • Works great on tablets and as a widget • Share your masterpieces on social media • Find friends from your contacts and facebook or be completely private • No history is saved, once you erase it it’s gone SEE IT IN ACTION: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3o-GZJQqQqE FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS: http://loklok.co/faq/ ----------------------------------------- Help us make LokLok better We’re working hard on the app and your feedback helps us know what to focus on next. If you have any problems, questions or suggestions please email us at: feedback@loklok.co Follow us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/loklokapp and on twitter: http://twitter.com/loklokapp @loklokapp -----------------------------------------

description: Ad Free! ARTBus is a bus finding application made exclusively for the ART (Arlington Transit) system. The app allows you to input a Bus Stop ID, Browse a List of stops, view a selectable Map, and even search for Buses Nearby (using GPS) to view REALTIME bus arrival information for any stop. No more standing in the cold/hot/dark waiting for your bus. ART Bus also allows you to save a list of your favorite bus stops to easily access later. ARTBus now includes a widget! Add it to your homescreen for quick access to your favorites and the Bus Stop Number input. Please email me anytime for feedback: ARTBusApp@gmail.com This app is in no way affiliated with ART, Arlington Transit, Connexionz, or ACCS. from the ART website:"ART - Arlington Transit operates within Arlington County, Virginia, supplementing Metrobus with smaller, neighborhood-friendly vehicles and providing access to Metrorail and Virginia Railway Express (VRE). Most of ART's state-of-the ART buses operate on clean-burning natural gas; all have climate control to keep you comfortable and dependable schedules to keep you on time."

description: Aristotle (384–322 BCE) was a Greek philosopher and scientist born in Stagirus, northern Greece, in 384 BCE. His father, Nicomachus, died when Aristotle was a child, whereafter Proxenus of Atarneus became his guardian. At eighteen, he joined Plato's Academy in Athens and remained there until the age of thirty-seven (c. 347 BCE). His writings cover many subjects – including physics, biology, zoology, metaphysics, logic, ethics, aesthetics, poetry, theater, music, rhetoric, linguistics, politics and government – and constitute the first comprehensive system of Western philosophy. Shortly after Plato died, Aristotle left Athens and, at the request of Philip of Macedon, tutored Alexander the Great between 356 and 323 BCE. According to the Encyclopædia Britannica, "Aristotle was the first genuine scientist in history ... [and] every scientist is in his debt." Find everything you want to know about Aristotle in form of BIOGRAPHY and FACTS or enjoy QUOTES and GALLERY. This app is part of our History Apps collection(available for free on Google Play). If you like our apps or want to find out more about us go to: https://www.facebook.com/aliensareblue Also, if you have any complaints or notice any bugs send us an e-mail on: aliensareblue6equj5@gmail.com This app is released under a Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 3.0 International licence (CC-BY-SA). See licence here: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ Content source: Wikipedia ( http://www.wikipedia.org )

It's a new kind of dating app, simple and to the point. It's free and very easy to use, log in and meet people! Meet singles on your city or your region and flirt with them. Or maybe you just want to meet new friends, the decision is all yours! Maybe you have tried dating services and have not found your partner... don't worry, just try Cerca Chat, a quick an easy way to chat with people near you. And if you are bored of paying in other apps install Cerca Chat. It's free! -- PLEASE, INSTEAD OF RATING NEGATIVELY SEND US A MAIL WITH YOUR SUGGESTIONS AND WE WILL HELP YOU. THANKS! --
release_text: Fixed a crash when receiving messages

description: http://makemyandroidapp.com makemyandroidapp@gmail.com This app will assist you in playing the Chaos Magic format of the card game Magic the Gathering. Have idea's for neat effects? Send them to me and they may appear in future versions of this application =)
release_text: Text Size is now optional, press Menu->Settings to set it. The newest version forgets that you've already seen the rules pop up. It will come up one more time, feel free to curse me during the time it takes you to tap the no button. Once you've done that it won't bother you again. You can now create and use your own effects for this application. You need to create txt files and place them inside the ChaosMTG folder on the SD card. See the readme.txt file in that directory for more info.

description: FLY CHEAP, SLEEP CHEAP ***************************************** The CheapTickets app for Android offers the ability to search and securely book the same selection of cheap flights, hotels,and car rentals offered on CheapTickets.com, along with exclusive mobile-only hotel deals of up to 50% off for tonight-only or future hotel stays in more than 200 popular destinations worldwide. Plus, join our CheapCash loyalty program and start earning CheapCash on flight bookings that you can instantly apply toward hotels in the app! The app also gives you access to all your itineraries while on the go. Highlights include: * Search and securely book the same selection of cheap flights, hotels, and car rentals offered on CheapTickets.com – all via an experience optimized for your Android device * Join our CheapCash loyalty program and start earning CheapCash on your flight bookings that you can instantly apply toward hotels in the app! * Get exclusive mobile-only hotel deals of up to 50% off for tonight-only or future hotel stays in more than 200 popular destinations worldwide * Find hotels near your current location – great for last-minute bookings * Get 1-tap access to your recent searches * Use powerful sort & filter options to help you quickly find the right hotel, flight, or rental car for your trip * Swipe through hotel photos and check out ratings & reviews from travelers, including verified CheapTickets bookers * Sign-in to your CheapTickets account for an even faster booking process – the app pre-fills booking info such as name, phone #, frequent flier #, and billing information. You can also sign-in to the app or create a CheapTickets account using your Facebook or Google+ sign-in info -- one less password to remember! * Access your itineraries while on the go APP PERMISSIONS -------------------- • Device & app history: The app uses this to manage its own tasks and offer an improved experience when you switch between different sections of the app. For example, if you search for a hotel and then a flight, the app remembers your hotel progress so you can more easily plan multiple aspects of a trip at once. • Identity: The app uses this so that Google+ users can sign in to their account on the app. • Location: The app uses this to allow you to search for hotels, airports, and other places near your current location. • Photos/Media/Files: The app uses this to display Google Maps. For example, you can toggle to a map-based view of hotel search results within the app.
release_text: Now you can select adults + children when searching for a hotel. If your party includes children, you can often find a better deal by not entering them as adults. With Google’s Smart Lock for Passwords, the CheapTickets app can automatically log you in if you’ve logged into CheapTickets.com in Chrome before, even from your PC/Mac. Access recent travel searches + info saved in your CheapTickets account. Earn CheapCash on flights & redeem on hotels. Get flight delay & gate change notifications.

description: Checkersland is a free program that supports more than 30 kinds of checkers. A very strong artificial intelligence, good-looking interface and a lot of useful settings for playing hot-seat with another opponent or on your phone against the AI. Don't miss this game! * Supported kinds of checkers: 80-cellular, Armenian, Brazilian/German, Canadian, checkers/American, corners (12 draughts), corners (9 draughts), croda, crowded, Czech, diagonal, Filipino, give-away, gothic, Greek, international/Polish, Italian, laska, lika, Malaysian/Singaporean, pool, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, sparse, Sri Lankian, stavropol, Thai, towers, towers give-away, and Turkish * Two-player mode * Improved AI and 7 levels of difficulty from novice to professional * The game supports more than 10 languages * Beautiful interface and several board skins: wood, marble and leather * The game looks great on all devices: on small screens there is only necessary information and the board is as large as possible, on large screens and tablets high-resolution images are used * Fluid animation with animation speed setting * Moves selection is possible by touching and dragging * Undo and redo move are supported * Current game is always stored, therefore you can continue it at any time * Sounds are available and can be turned off * Additional useful settings: possible move highlighting, quick move selection, disable screen dimming or deny screen auto-rotation * On multi-core devices the AI uses all the cores and makes moves faster * The game is optimized very well and its size is less than 1 megabyte, so it doesn't take up a lot of space on your phone or tablet Keywords: shashki, checkers, draughts, dama, damas, online, play, logic, brain games, free, single-player, two-player
release_text: Version 1.7 Small fixes and improvements Added "game over" window Italian translation completed Version 1.6.1 The game translated into additional language Small fixes and improvements Simplified novice level Version 1.6 The game translated into 4 additional languages The game supports Android 2.2 Small fixes and improvements

description: The Chopra Connect Android app delivers unprecedented access to Deepak Chopra's universe. All the news, media, insights, thoughts, videos and events from Deepak Chopra, The Foundation, The Chopra Center, Intent Blog, and The Chopra Well on YouTube direct to your Android Device. From Deepak's views on consciousness, business leadership, happiness, science, politics, and relationships to The Chopra Well YouTube channel, The Intent Blog, Chopra Center news and Sages & Scientists Symposium content. Chopra Connect brings you into Deepak's world like never before.
release_text: * Fixed issue of feeds not loading and not updating with latest content.

description: Thank you for you patience and support and we apologise for any inconvenience you have experienced.*** The complete cinema package from UK's number one cinema chain* has arrived! With the official Cineworld Cinemas app you can search for film times, watch trailers, securely book tickets and mark your local Cineworld Cinemas as favourites - you'll always be in the know about what's on at your local cinema. Not sure what to see? Then simply search through our extensive list of current films. For those of you who just want to know what is planned for release in the future then you can easily browse for films coming soon! Maps and directions for our cinemas make finding us easy but if need be it's only a simple tap to call so you can speak to the cinema direct. All in all this is your one stop shop to search, decide, organise and book your trip to a Cineworld Cinema. Best of all, it's FREE! Features: * A-Z of cinemas. * View show-times for a cinema. * Securely book your tickets on the Cineworld website directly through the app. * View top films, films now showing and coming soon. * Watch film trailers. * Save your favourite cinemas. * View maps and directions to cinemas. * View cinema services. * Call Cineworld's dedicated telephone booking line. We're constantly looking to improve our app, please keep sending feedback to: http://www.cineworld.co.uk/contact . We hope you enjoy our latest features and have more to come in 2012. Thanks for all your support! * Number one by box office (Source – EDI Rentrak 2010) Before proceeding, please read the Cineworld Android App End User License Agreement (EULA) by going to: http://www.cineworld.com/android/eula . By downloading the Cineworld App you are confirming that you have read and accepted the terms of the EULA.
release_text: v2.0.5 * Minor bug fixes * Showtime availability updates for cut-off times v2.0.4 * Minor bug fixes v2.0.3 * Minor bug fixes v2.0.2 * Minor bug fixes v2.0.1 * Battery improvements * Bug fixes for Ireland v2.0.0 * Complete UI overhaul * Bug fixes * General improvements * Performance improvements

description: - S’adapte avec simplicité à tous les commerces Connectill est une solution d’encaissement qui s’installe sur tous les systèmes mobiles fonctionnant sous Androïd. La solution Connectill s’adapte à tous types de commerce : Snack, Mercerie, Boulangerie, Pâtisserie, Commerce de Vêtements, de Chaussures, Pizzeria, Commerce de Fruits et Légumes, Marchand de Fleurs, d’Articles de souvenirs, Street-Food, etc. Grâce à sa mobilité, la solution Connectill est particulièrement adaptée aux commerces de rue et d’une façon générale aux commerces ambulants. Pour autant Connectill peut être déployé dans des commerces traditionnels et s’avère particulièrement utile lorsque l’on doit équiper plusieurs points de vente. Vous ajoutez, modifiez, supprimez vos produits comme vous le souhaitez et vous les classez par rubrique. Bien sûr, c’est vous aussi qui choisissez vos rubriques. Avec Connectill, vous êtes libre de faire comme vous voulez. - Encaissement mobile partout en ligne Connectill est votre logiciel de caisse 100% connecté, et sait également travailler en mode hors-ligne. Pas besoin de connexion internet ! Concentrez-vous sur ce que vous savez faire de mieux, Connectill fait le reste ! Vous consacrez votre temps à vos clients. La facturation et l’encaissement ne sont plus qu’une formalité. Du bout des doigts sur votre écran tactile vous « tapotez » la facture. L’encaissement devient un outil de fidélisation. Vous recueillez le n° de mobile de votre client ou son adresse électronique en lui proposant de lui envoyer la facture directement par SMS ou e-mail. Vous constituez votre fichier client sans effort pendant que Connectill envoie automatiquement les factures. Quelle caisse enregistreuse vous en propose autant que Connectill ? - Gestion et analyse de votre activité Gardez un œil sur vos activités commerciales. A l’aide de votre navigateur préféré, allez sur votre Espace personnalisé. Retrouvez l’historique de vos ventes, vos factures détaillées, consultez vos outils d’analyse sur la période que vous souhaitez. A votre disposition : Chiffre d’Affaires de la période et nombre de factures, Top 10 des produits les plus vendus, Analyse graphique des ventes par rubrique, par mode de règlement, par mode de vente, par taux de TVA, Analyse graphique de l’évolution du CA, Pour compléter ces standards, exportez vos données au format Excel et créez vos propres analyses - Sécurité des données sur le Cloud Ayez l’esprit tranquille. Vos données sont sécurisées et sauvegardées sur nos serveurs. Indépendance et Sécurité sont les maîtres mots de Connectill. Indépendance en effet puisque vous pouvez stocker vos données pendant une semaine sur votre smartphone ou votre tablette sans que ceux-ci soient connectés. Aussi souvent que vous le souhaitez et au moins une fois par semaine, vous devez synchroniser votre appareil mobile avec votre Espace de gestion à l’aide d’une connexion WIFI. Il suffit d’effleurer l’icône pour lancer la synchronisation. Vos données sont sauvegardées sur nos serveurs, elles y sont en sécurité. Votre matériel est en panne ! Pas de soucis, vous installez Connectill sur un autre matériel de type Androïd, vous vous identifiez, vous récupérez toutes vos données et vous continuez à travailler. - Adapts easily to all shops Connectill is a POS solution that installs on all mobile devices running Android. Connectill the solution adapts to all types of trade: Snack, Haberdashery, Bakery, Cake, Trade Clothing, Shoes, Pizza, Retail Fruits and Vegetables, Flowers Marchand, of Sporting memorabilia, Street-Food, etc. . Due to its mobility, Connectill solution is particularly suited to street shops and generally to street shops. Provided Connectill can be deployed in traditional shops and is particularly useful when you need to equip several outlets. You add, edit, delete your products as you want and you rank by category. Of course, it's also that you choose your topics. With Connectill, you are free to do as you want. - Cashing mobile anywhere online Connectill your software box 100% connected, and knows also work in offline mode. No need for internet connection! Focus on what you do best, Connectill does the rest! You dedicate your time to your customers. Billing and collection are only a formality. Fingertip on the touch screen you "tap" the bill. The collection becomes a retention tool. You collect the mobile number of your client or email offering to send the invoice directly by SMS or email. You build your client file while effortlessly Connectill automatically sends invoices. Which cash register offers you as much as Connectill? - Management and analysis of your business Keep an eye on your business. Using your favorite browser, go to your personal space. Find the history of your sales, detailed invoices, check your analytics for the period you want. At your disposal: Turnover for the period and number of invoices, Top 10 best selling products, Graphical analysis of sales by category, by payment method, by way of sale, the VAT rate, Graphical analysis of the evolution of the CA, To complement these standards, export your data to Excel and create your own analysis - Data security in the cloud Have peace of mind. Your data is secure and backed up on our servers. Independence and safety are the hallmarks of Connectill. Independence in fact since you can store your data for a week on your smartphone or tablet without them are connected. As often as you wish and at least once a week, you must synchronize your mobile device with your space management with a WIFI connection. Simply touch the icon to start the synchronization. Your data is stored on our servers, they are safe. Your equipment is down! No worries, you install Connectill another Android hardware type you identify, you get all your data and you continue to work.
release_text: Prise en charge de l'impression USB Interface de statistiques Nouvel écran d'accueil Optimisations Correction de bugs

description: Manage frantic short orders in this crazy cooking game! Keep the orders coming and don't overcook them or you'll be fired! Move too slowly and your food will burn in the pan and customers will become upset. Start with cooking breakfast pancakes, sausages, and hash browns and unlock the full range of foods as you keep cooking. As you gain skill, orders become faster, how fast can you keep cooking?! Simple to learn and easy to play. Enjoy pretending to be an old school cook in this arcade style game set in a 1950's diner. Features 18 distinct levels and an endless mode for continuous fun. New with version 1.1 - Added background music and sound effects to the main game activity. Reviews: "Really fun. Wasn't hard to learn like other games and reminded me of Cooking Mama. Kept me entertained at the airport." -Jill H. "It was fun to play and kind of easy.And I love to cook and I thought it was cool. :)" -D. Hant
release_text: Version 1.2 * Fixed bug that would cause application to crash on some devices Version 1.3 * Reduced application size on device by 75% * Changed done cooking sound to a bell * Fixed a bug related to music and tablet rotation * Updated application to use latest version of AndEngine * Improved application performance through object pooling * Fixed flicker bug with the pause menu

description: CEP brings you a simple, easy to use, credit score reference guide. This will teach you the basics of a credit score. Such as how a score is created to how long delinquencies and other derogatory items stay on your credit report. Credit Scoring 101. We will break down the five categories of a credit score and then we will break down those into sub categories so even if you know absolutely nothing about a credit score, now you will know all of the basics...that is where it starts. CEP is not just a credit education company but we believe that is where it must start. The more you know about how a score is calculated the more likely you are to maintain that score as efficiently as possible. Please be mindful, this is exactly what it says...the basics. It is a very short, quick and FREE educational crash course. We are just getting started so if you have ANY questions or requests please feel free to ask. We will be adding a lot of great, very useful information, from how to be sure that there are no mistakes on your credit report and how to actually correct those very same mistakes. You ask it and we will answer it! Credit Enhancement Pro Your Score. Your Life. Your Freedom. TM

Depoza - an application for tracking personal expenses. Depoza helps you to understand, where all your money goes to. MAIN FEATURES: - Parsing text message based payment notifications; - Add new expense records in a convenient way; - Backing up and restoring data (Dropbox); - Unlimited number of expense categories; - Expense reports for a selected period. PARSING TEXT MESSAGE BASED PAYMENT NOTIFICATIONS: - Text messages are automatically identified and parsed by the application; - Application automatically guesses expense categories based on the previously received messages; - Automatic expense creation for pre-configurable payees. SUPPORTED BANKS: Alfa-Bank, Avangard, Bank of Moscow, Binbank Citibank, Delta, Emirates, Gazprom, HDFC, HomeCredit, MTS-Bank, OTP, Privat, Promsvyazbank, PUMB, QIWI, Raiffeisen Aval, Raiffeisen, Rosbank, Russian Standard, Saint Petersburg, Sberbank, Svyaznoy, Tinkoff, UkrSibbank, UniCredit, Uralsib, VTB, VTB24, Zapsibkombank.
release_text: v1.1.5 - Supported HDFC bank. - Added support for the new Sberbank and Tinkoff templates. v1.1.4 - Improved support for Sberbank and Citibank. v1.1.3 - Further improvements for Sberbank messages support. v1.1.2 - Added support for the new Sberbank templates. - Improved support for Raiffeisen and Gazprom banks. - Supported Emirates bank. - Some improvements in the UI. v1.1.1 - Improved support for existing banks. v1.1 - Added support for Binbank; - Improved support for existing banks.

description: DrinkMan is last man standing drinking game for more players. It's similar to game called "Cugopol". Choose drink, move across the board, roll dices, do what card says and have a lot of fun with your friends. It's perfect for parties :) Cheers! :)
release_text: 1.1: Language bug fixed. Home button bug fixed. 1.2: Added German localization. Improved game algorithm and logic Fixed minor bugs 1.3: Reduced app size Fixed bugs 1.4: Bug fixing for some devices 1.5: Bug fixing for some devices

description: DsaTab ist eine Android App, mit der man seine Helden direkt auf seinem Handy/Tablet zum "Das schwarze Auge" Rollenspielabend mitnehmen kann und sich so einige Zettel und Rechnereien erspart. Die Helden können mit der Helden-Software.de erstellt werden und dann auf dem Handy mit Hilfe von DsaTab zum Spielabend mitgenommen werden. Berechtigungen: - INHALT DES USB-SPEICHERS UND DER SD-KARTE ÄNDERN/LÖSCHEN Speichern/Lesen der Helden Dateien und zusätzlich heruntergeladener Bilderpakete - UNEINGESCHRÄNKTER INTERNETZUGRIFF Herunterladen der Bilderpakete, Fehlerberichte senden, Helden Export/Import - AUDIO AUFNEHMEN Diktiergerätfunktion unter dem Tab "Notizen". Herkunft der Bilder für das Funktionsbild sind: - Anja Di Paolo - Anna Steinbauer - Bildmaterial aus dem DSA MMORPG Herokon Online der Silver Style Studios GmbH DsaTab is an Android app that you can take with his heroes directly on his mobile phone / tablet for "The Dark Eye" role-playing evening and so save some paper and Rechnereien. The heroes can be created with the hero-Software.de and are then taken on the phone with the help of DsaTab for game night. Permissions: - CONTENTS OF USB MEMORY AND THE SD CARD CHANGE / DELETE   Save / read of heroes files downloaded pictures and additional packages - UNQUALIFIED INTERNET ACCESS   Downloads images packages, bug reports, send heroes Export / Import - AUDIO RECORDING   Dictaphone function under the tab "Notes". Origin of the images for the image function are: - Anja Di Paolo - Anna Steinbauer - Images from the DSA Online MMORPG Herokon the Silver Style Studios GmbH
release_text: - Android Material Styling - "Treffer kassieren" Dialog hinzugefügt - Schriftbild überarbeitet - Design überarbeitet: neue Icons, erste Anpassungen basierend auf Material Design Guides - Kompatibilität mit HeldenSoftware beim Reimportieren verbessert - Popups bei Fernkampf, Ausweichen in Würfelleiste integriert - Modifikatoren in Würfelleiste können einzeln deaktiviert werden - Behälter Konfiguration überarbeitet

description: Release Sale!! For Limited Time 50% Discount. ★★★★★ “Kids Fireman is a great app that will let your toddlers discover the world of a fireman via a fun interactive games play" by funeducationalapps.com ★★★★★ “If your kid wants to be a firefighter and you need to show him how it’s like then Kids Fireman is the best choice” by kids-apps.mobi “When left alone with my phone, my son has recently been choosing to play this application a lot by himself. I am impressed that he has learned how to dial 911 from playing with the app after some practice, something that I hope in real life never comes up, but it is important for him nonetheless to understand how to do it.” by giggleapps.com “It is a super duper fun game! And I love touching all the buttons” by youngest customer If your children love firefighters, this app is a must have! Go through the life of a firefighter from the moment the fire alarm sounds at the fire station to putting out the fire and rescuing a cat. It is fun and interactive with exciting background music. Slide up, slide down, move, touch and poke various objects with real sound effects and colorful scenes. Children will feel like a firefighter. Explore and find out all the fun, silly and informative things that are very much part of a firefighter's daily life. This app is full of activities that your children will love. Kids Fireman is made by a parent, tested and approved by a firefighter. Features: * Pick up the Receiver and Dial the Emergency Number * Look inside the fire station. Ring the bell. Poke the dog. * Slip-slide down the fire pole. Open the closet. * Dress a firefighter * Drive a fire truck * Control the steering wheel. Sound the siren and two-way Radio on the fire truck * Check various fire equipments on the fire truck * Put out the fire in a building * Climb up a ladder and rescue a cat. * Play with Sparky (Fetching, Poking, and Petting) Please check out images and video clips from fire station at http://on.fb.me/bJIgdP . Follow us at http://www.twitter.com/DuckyLuckyStd . Support: Please contact us at support@duckylucky.com if you have any technical issue. Ducky Lucky Studio is a member of Moms with Apps, a collaborative group of family-friendly developers seeking to promote quality apps for kids and families. Recommended Ages: 1-3, 4-7 Categories: Creative Play, Environment, Games, Music

Have a feel of Latest Android 4.4 Kitkat SMS Messaging Simple UI experience. Kitkat SMS is ported from original android kitkat 4.4 open source. It provides 8 different colored theme and color contact as provided by Android Kitkat 4.4. Features: • Various SMS template with emoji are added in a nice way in the keyboard itself. • Messaging app that separate you from hangout specially on Nexus 5. • Support Android Latest Kitkat - Android 4.4 Note:To use Kitkat SMS separately from google hangout application please set this Kitkat SMS as your default SMS app.

app_name: Baby Flash Cards Plus for Kids
description: Everything from our popular Baby Flash Cards App ★ PLUS - Adfree Categories include: Food items, Animals, Alphabet, Transportation, Numbers, Colors & Shapes, Clothing, Household items, Body Parts, Outdoor items, Music Instruments/Arts & Learning. ★ 12 Categories - All in 1 App! ★ Over 450 words! ★ Kids tested - they love it! Parents tested - they love it! ★ Building vocabulary has never been so much fun ★ Large words and letters ★ Large icons and buttons ★ Professional voiceovers recorded in production studio ★ High quality images ★ Real sounds where applicable ★ Question mode for parent-child interaction ★ Great memory building exercise Building strong English vocabulary has never been so exciting for preschoolers and toddlers. eFlash Plus Educational Baby Flash Cards in English features over 450 high quality images with text and voiceovers. There are additional real sounds where applicable (such as a lion's roar or an ambulance siren) to enhance visual and auditory learning and memory simultaneously. Parents have the option to turn voiceovers off during parent-child learning session and turn voiceovers on when the child is self-learning. They can enable Question Mode to display 4 images and ask the child to click on the right answer. Complexity of words is perfect for ages 1 to 4 so two or more young siblings can play together and even teach eachother!
release_text: Baby Flash Cards get a make-over: * All NEW HD graphics, icons and flash cards for latest phone and tablet screens * Original background music added for an even better learning experience! * Swipe option and hide/show text in Settings * Much improved swipe and Next/Previous transitions http://www.eflashapps.com

Parents tested - they love it! ★ Building vocabulary has never been so much fun ★ Large words and letters ★ Large icons and buttons ★ Professional voice overs recorded in production studio ★ High quality images ★ Real sounds where applicable ★ Question mode for parent-child interaction ★ Great memory building exercise Building strong Russian vocabulary has never been so exciting for preschoolers and toddlers. eFlash Educational Baby Flash Cards in Russian features over 450 high quality images with text and voice overs. There are additional real sounds where applicable (such as a lion's roar or an ambulance siren) to enhance visual and auditory learning and memory simultaneously. Parents have the option to turn voice overs off during parent-child learning session and turn voice overs on when the child is self-learning. They can enable Question Mode to display 4 images and ask the child to click on the right answer. Complexity of words is perfect for ages 1 to 4 so two or more young siblings can play together and even teach each other!

EasilyDo is an award winning assistant that organizes your work and personal life. Less work, less worry, and more time for you. Here’s some of what this thoughtful virtual assistant does: Merges duplicate contacts, checks traffic so you know when to leave for a meeting, identifies email you may have forgotten to respond to, reminds you of meetings committed to in email that are not on your calendar, adds flights to calendar & notifies you of delays or cancellations— even TSA security wait times! All this is done without you lifting a finger. EasilyDo streamlines your tasks by connecting to apps & services you care about. Connect and manage your email accounts and calendars from Gmail, Yahoo, Exchange and IMAP accounts, and other services like LinkedIn, Evernote and Facebook. Also supports virtually all airlines, hotels, restaurants, shipment providers, & rental car companies. Recommended on NBC’s Today Show by Randi Zuckerberg, The Katie Couric Show, and featured by Apple on the iTunes home page! Critically acclaimed by Time, WSJ, New York Times & more. Over 43 automated features: Navigate Your Day • Alerts when it’s time to go with drive time and parking • Auto-dial in to conference calls and view attendees’ LinkedIn profiles • Driving & public transit times for daily commute • Directions and drive time to home & work • Weather forecast for home or travel • Enter to-dos Travel Stress-free • Access boarding passes • Get flight status (delays, cancellations, gate changes) • Add itineraries to calendar • View confirmations for hotels, car rentals, restaurants (OpenTable), movies (Fandango), and events (Eventbrite, Meetup, Ticketmaster), and add to calendar Get Notified • Track packages • Set reminders for bills • Get bad weather alerts • Be notified of important emails • Respond to actionable emails on the go. Stay Connected • Schedule personalized birthday greetings with a personal photo via email or Facebook • RSVP to invitations from Facebook, GCal, and Evite • Catch important and trending updates from Facebook friends • Congratulate a LinkedIn connection on a new job • View top photos of the day and pics you're tagged in from Instagram and Facebook, plus trending photos. • Add Facebook profile pics to your contacts Get Organized • Find contact info from an email to update Contacts, Salesforce, and/or Evernote & connect on LinkedIn • Remove outdated emails from Contacts • Merge duplicate contacts • Create calendar events automatically for meetings you've agreed to over email • File receipts • Backup emails & attachments to Dropbox, Evernote or Box • Clean out deals & old calendar reminders • Sync your Facebook profile pic to Twitter • Preview email attachments Recurring Premium Services: • Merge duplicate contacts removes all the duplicate entries from a contacts list at once • Discovers info for new and existing contacts from emails and syncs automatically • Store a backup of your entire device's Contacts list • Real-time email discovery for all email related tasks • Add up to 5 alerts for ‘Important Email’ Alerts • Auto-forward receipts for expense management • Save 10% on gift cards for your friends’ birthdays (iOS only) • Receive fast travel notifications for delays, cancellations, & gate changes • Executive level support for any question Recurring Business Services: • Get all the benefits of Premium plus, • Add contacts from email and Evernote Business Card Scanner to any Salesforce object • Log emails and meeting notes to Salesforce • Touch ID and MobileIron integration for security • Centralized administration & phone support • Add Evernote Notes, transcribed audio notes, and attachments to related Salesforce objects • Smart reminders to update Opportunities One-time purchase: Catch All Contacts! This feature will scan your email history and find contact information you've missed over the last 1 or 5 years. Your data is always yours and always protected.
release_text: • Numerous performance and design improvements • New Salesforce features for Business - Catch all Salesforce contacts - Add and update contacts from email - Add contacts from Evernote Business Card Scanner - Add transcribed audio notes and meeting notes from Evernote to Salesforce Opportunities - Log emails and meeting notes to a related Lead or Contact - Upload attachments from Box, Dropbox, or Evernote to any related Salesforce object - Smart reminders to update Opportunities in Salesforce

description: 1st Chess game with Elo Rating! Enjoy correspondence Chess at its best with this game and become the Grandmaster of Android Chess! The ultimate challenge has just arrived. Chess Elite fuses the power of one of the strongest Chess Engine with the power of Web to keep you connected on the go and provides you with the best challenges. The game is perfectly crafted for both the beginners and the advanced players. If you’re among the people who miss the days when you could sit down with your friends for a relaxing game of Chess, here’s the perfect opportunity to send them a request and enjoy a game of Chess, as with Chess Elite, the distance in miles no longer matters!!! Battle it out in the ‘War of the Wits’ as Chess Elite gives you the chance to play with Pros from all across the globe. FEATURES: -Play against Contacts and community of chess players -Intuitive and easy to use UIs with spectacular graphics -Shows legal moves, coordinates, last moves -Elo Rating system to rate the relative chess skills of players -Game summary in terms of overall Wins and Losses -Sort feature to display the list of opponents sorted based on Name, Elo Rating, Max Wins, Max Losses -Chess Elite Clubs and Smart Groups to categorize players - Chat feature that lets you discuss the game, share Chess tips and tactics. - Play against Chess Elite community players of iPhone version

app_name: Báo Mới - Doc Bao Sieu Dep
description: Báo Mới là ứng dụng đọc báo online trên di động MIỄN PHÍ đẹp nhất hiện nay với trải nghiệm hoàn toàn mới lạ. Sử dụng công nghệ máy tính thông minh độc quyền của BaoMoi.com, phần mềm cho phép bạn đọc nhanh các tin tức nóng và mới nhất trong ngày được chọn lọc từ hơn 150 báo điện tử tại Việt Nam. HOT: Báo Mới đã ra mắt phiên bản Báo Mới HD hỗ trợ đọc báo trên máy tính bảng Android với giao diện cực đẹp, hỗ trợ cả chế độ xoay ngang và cầm dọc, tương thích với mọi máy tính bảng 7" và 10". Các ưu điểm nổi bật: - Đọc báo với tốc độ nhanh nhất, tối ưu cho kết nối 3G và Wifi. - Đọc báo Offline (khi không có kết nối) - Đọc báo với giao diện đẹp, lật trang như báo in. - Tin nóng được tổng hợp và chọn lọc thông minh, cập nhật liên tục suốt 24h tại tất cả các báo điện tử tại VN. - Dễ dàng tùy biến giao diện, thêm các đầu báo yêu thích vào trang chủ - Xem thời tiết và tin tức theo địa phương - Xem ảnh hài và video hài tổng hợp từ Zini - Dễ dàng chia sẻ tin tức lên các mạng xã hội hàng đầu như Facebook, Zing Me.. Trong thời gian sắp tới, Báo Mới sẽ cập nhật tin tức từ các forum, blog và mạng xã hội hàng đầu tại Việt Nam. Hãy truy cập http://baomoi.mobi hoặc email cho chúng tôi tại info@epi.com.vn . Theo dõi các thông tin mới nhất tại @baomoi trên Twitter hoặc http://www.facebook.com/Baomoi trên Facebook. Cac uu Diem noi bat: - Doc bao voi toc do nhanh nhat, toi uu cho ket noi 3G va Wifi. - Doc bao Offline (khi khong co ket noi). - Doc bao voi giao dien dep, lat trang nhu bao in. - Tin nong duoc tong hop va chon loc thong minh, cap nhat lien tuc suot 24h tai tat ca cac bao dien tu tai VN. - De dang tuy bien giao dien, them cac dau bao yeu thich vao trang chu. - Weather & Local news - Xem anh hai va video hai tong hop tu Zini. - De dang chia se tin tuc len cac mang xa hoi hang dau nhu Facebook, Zing Me..

description: Equation Droid is a very useful, intuitive and nice quadratic equation solver. Stop going crazy with all those equations. Stop trying to remember all those math formulas. Just use Equation Droid. Fill the fields with your coefficients and that's it. The app will tell you everything about the equation : - Discriminant - Solutions - Factorization Your result will be shown through a fantastic simplification of radicals and fractions.

Now you can stay on top of your credit and protect your identity on the go with our FREE app. Equifax Places on your Android device utilizes your GPS location to show you: - Equifax Credit Score™: Average credit scores in your area - Fraud Index: The frequency of identity fraud in your area - Credit Rankings: How your credit measures up to others in your area Want more? With an eligible Equifax product, you can also: - Lock and unlock your Equifax credit file* - View alerts about key credit file changes - Check your Equifax Credit Score–anywhere, anytime - Get one-stop protection if you ever lose your wallet …all from your Android device! Try it for FREE now. --- Disclaimers Equifax Credit Rankings™ and Equifax Fraud Index™ are trademarks of Equifax Inc. *Locking your credit file with Equifax Credit Report Control will prevent access to your Equifax credit file by certain third parties, such as credit grantors or other companies and agencies. Credit Report Control will not prevent access to your credit file at any other credit reporting agency, and will not prevent access to your Equifax credit file by companies like Equifax Personal Solutions which provide you with access to your credit report or credit score or monitor your credit file; Federal, state and local government agencies; companies reviewing your application for employment; companies that have a current account or relationship with you, and collection agencies acting on behalf of those whom you owe; for fraud detection and prevention purposes; and companies that wish to make pre-approved offers of credit or insurance to you.

Lightweight, practical, effective and fun! This app lets you protect your Facebook privacy through a PIN. After installation it will ask you to set a 4 digit PIN, and will show the configuration options to lock Facebook You can customize auto-lock time, so you don't need to enter the PIN every time you change task on your device. If you enter a wrong pin and your phone has front camera, it will take a picture of the intruder and saved in the photo gallery. Have fun in detecting the intruder! (Only devices with front camera) Features ★ It's free and has no limitations. ★ Keep your messages safe ★ Capture intruders when wrong PIN entered. Have Fun :) ★ Customize autolock time ★ Don't make you crazy with strange advertising. ★ It is ultra lightweight. Uses low resources and space. ★ Minimun special permissions required ★ Design attractive and simple user interface. Remember: If you like our work, please don't forget the stars :) Thank you

description: This app provides tide times for Galway, Ireland. Tourists and locals alike could use this app to ensure the tidal conditions are correct for all their water based activities. The information provided by this application is provided by the UKHO and downloaded via http://www.tidetimes.org.uk . I would like to thank the website's owner for this. If you find any issues with the app please send me an email or leave a comment and I will send out anupdate with the fix ASAP.
release_text: Version 2.8 * Style update Version 2.7 * Bug Fixes Version 2.6 * Added day of week to the list for easier planning * Fixed issue with random characters being displayed Version 2.5 * Fixed bug where day selector was empty. Version 2.2 * Fixed annoying bug where '>' character was shown before some tide times for some days * Fixed the refresh bug where the times would change but the selector on top wouldn't so the wrong data was shown for the date

description: Browse the countries of the earth, in a way you could not have done before. With over 300 flags and up–to–date data for countries and territories, it is a great geography app for all. Powerful listing options include: Browse by region (ex. Arab League, Balkans, Baltics, BRICS, Caribbean, Commonwealth of Independent States, Commonwealth of Nations, European Union, Euro Zone, Francophonie, Mediterranean States, Middle East, Southeast Asia, NATO, United Nations and more). Stats for total number of countries, total area, total population for every search result as well as web links to wikipedia for all countries and search categories. Extra functions for search for monarchies, islands with island count, countries with similar flags, territories for a given country, countries with similar names to their capitals, and countries that share the same capital names, searches for territories as well. And many more options such as standard functions to filter by continent, and sort function to sort by area, population, country names, capitals, continents, or islands count in ascending or descending order. Background music with Blue Danube by Straus with sound-off option

First of its kind free language survival tool! Geolocation or POI specific phrasebook based on social networking. 14+ languages, REAL-TIME translation help offered by community's native speakers. Learn any language through interactive language learning tool. * 14 languages (English, 中文, Español, 日本語, Português, Deutsch, Français, Русский, 한국어, Türkçe, עברית, Italiano, Wikang Tagalog, لعربية, more coming soon) * Use the search function to locate points of interest nearby, press walk and you are presented with a list of essential phrases for that particular point of interest. No more headaches trying to look for the correct category! * Phrases sorted by most common topics of interest * Phrases can be selected either from the list or through the search function * REAL-TIME translation support, if a phrase is not on the list, you can ask the community native speakers to help you with translation! * Self evolving phrasebook - the phrase database is constantly updated and expanded by users to include any missing phrases. Have a phrase for every eventuality! * Learn the language through a variety of associative memory and self-testing, track your learning progress through our built-in statistics tool. * Make your friends jealous by sharing your location, what you are saying and learning through our "Babble" function

description: GhostFiles can easily and safely hide media files like photo and videos from your phone's gallery. It also features the fastest gallery and file processing (hide and unhide) of all the market. Your pictures and videos will disappear as if they never were there. Protect the access to your valuable data through a PIN number. Supports item multiselection. Maintains the original internal structure of your private files in their corresponding folders Includes an internal browser of photos and videos that also allows you to delete, rotate or share, etc.. Use 1-touch function to unhide all items in a fast way. GhosFiles is the best way to protect your privacy in a simple and safe way. Enjoy! =) Features ★ Keep your photos and videos secure. ★ Manage photos and videos by folder. ★ Easy access by PIN. ★ Renewed nice, easy and userfriendly interface. ★ Maintain original folder and file structure. ★ Supports multi-selection. ★ Unhide all with a one-touch button! ★ Internal photos and videos browser. ★ Share photos & videos from Ghosfiles ★ Hide images directly from Facebook via share button ★ Keeps original images and videos resolutions. ★ Function rotation, zoom and erase items. ★ Function play, delete videos ★ Function Data Recovery in case of improper uninstallation If you like our work, please don't forget the stars :) Remember: bad rating doesn't help to solve problems. If you have any inconvenient, send us an e-mail. We'll be glad to help. Thank you!
release_text: v2.3.5 Added hide function for Facebook images, via the facebook share button (select GhostFiles) Added tutorial and minor UI changes New "Lazaro" Engine for file unhider and recover. Fixed minor bugs for some devices v2.3 Keeps hidden files in original media (internal or external) Bug fix for some devices Faster file processing Added japanese language v7 & v8 New interface to hide pictures and video! Minor design changes. Performance improvements. Korean language added.

description: Gift Organizer helps you organize with your friends either to buy a gift for them or to buy a gifts which you'd like receive. You can easy login used your Facebook acount, you can invite your friends to download and use the same app. If some of your friends does not have FB account you coult invite him by e-mail and he could sigh for the app. In My Gifts you add gift with description which you'd like to receive, if you receive a gift from your list you could either delete or mark as received. In My Friends you could add/invite friends and review their Gift Lists and eventually assign to participate in a group ready to buy one of them shareing the cost. description: There are many grocery apps in the app store, so whate makes our app different? Why should you use it? Our Grocery Organizer lets you: - quickly setup daily shopping lists. - transfer lists by bluetooth between members of the family who also own the app. - edit products' name picture and measurement, so they describe more accurately what you actually want to buy. - add new products if the ones you want are not present in the app. - start a "buy session", so you can check all the stuff that is already bought and know what else is left to buy. If some one like translate application labels in his own language, s/he is welcome. Just send e-mail to our support e-mail, we will send you the instructions and XLS file with all labels In the upcoming updates you will be able to send lists wherever your partner is via internet. He or she will be also sent push notification so even if their app is not running they will know they have a new list to do.

Get ready shopping with Grocery Buddy. List the things you need to buy and mark individual items as bought if necessary. Add the price for each grocery item and Grocery Buddy will compute the total before you even reach the store counter. Grocery Buddy can compare two products (i.e. soap) for you. For example, soap 1 and soap 2 has different prices and also have different product contents. Now, how can you tell which one is worth your money? Just input their details and Grocery Buddy will tell you which one you should buy. Features: - mark grocery item as bought - compare two products - total amount of the grocery items - Password protection of each grocery list - Share grocery list (through email, SMS, etc.)
release_text: Features: - mark grocery item as bought - compare two products - total amount of the grocery items - enable password protection for each grocery list - share grocery list (through email, SMS, etc.)

description: Easily track time, log expenses, and manage invoices on-the-go with Harvest. Use the beautiful timesheet to start a new timer on the train, or stop the one you left running at the office. The expense tracker allows you to snap receipt photos with your phone as you enter expenses, and keeps all your records organized. Send professional invoices and get notified when clients pay them. For teams, view your teammates’ timers in real-time and stay in sync on projects. ** Note: This app requires a free or paid Harvest account. ** SIMPLE TIME TRACKING & TIMESHEETS • Tap to start/stop project and task timers from anywhere • Support for manual entry of billable and nonbillable hours • View and edit current/previous time entries • Receive timely reminders to submit time (timesheet approval) • Track time online or offline SNAP RECEIPTS AND LOG EXPENSES, CONVENIENTLY • Enter expenses quickly and easily • Take receipt photos and upload right to Harvest • Track mileage and more for reimbursement • Submit expenses for client projects MANAGE INVOICES AND GET PAYMENT NOTIFICATIONS • Send and re-send professional invoices • Record and remove payments • View invoice history • Receive push notifications for payments STAY IN SYNC WITH TEAM STATUS • View teammates’ timers in real-time (administrators only) • Review detailed task notes for better project tracking All time and expense entries, and invoices, are seamlessly synced with your Harvest account. Sign in to Harvest from the web browser for access to more features like the project budget or uninvoiced reports. With Harvest, you’ll be spending less time managing your timesheet, and more time focusing on the task at hand. Get started today!
release_text: • Enhanced timesheet views and navigation • Swipe to navigate across days and weeks • At-a-glance daily and weekly hours totals • Default project, task and category selection • More consistent material design across all Android versions • Improved performance and stability

[Change the language of the app (Italian-English) from the menu] “Infusion” è un app semplice e funzionale. Senza tanti menu e sottomenu complicati, con due semplici passaggi permette di effettuare calcoli veloci che semplificano la vita in corsia. Quante volte è capitato di dover determinare la concentrazione di un farmaco diluito in una certa quantità di solvente? Oppure quante volte abbiamo avuto la necessità di infondere una certa quantità di milligrammi di principio attivo in una certa quantità di tempo? E ancora spesso ci siamo chiesti, ma a questa velocità di infusione, adesso che sono passati tre quarti d’ora, quanti mg di farmaco ho già somministrato al paziente? A queste domande risponde con precisione e semplicità “Infusion”, compagno prezioso del professionista sanitario. La lingua dell’applicazione (italiano / inglese) può essere facilmente cambiata dal tasto “menu” del telefono. Prima di acquistare la versione completa (questa), provate la versione “demo” del prodotto. Se dopo averla provata rimanete soddisfatti, acquistate la versione completa e sostenete l’ulteriore sviluppo dell’applicazione. Per segnalazioni di errori, commenti e suggerimenti scrivetemi: kapelis95@gmail.com [ENGLISH] "Infusion" is a simple and functional app. Without many complicated menus and submenus with two simple steps allows you to perform quick calculations that make life easier in the ward. How many times happened to having to determine the concentration of a drug diluted in a certain amount of solvent? Or how many times we had the need to infuse a certain amount of milligrams of a drug in a certain amount of time? And yet we often wondered, with this infusion rate, after 45 minutes, how many mg of drug I have already given to the patient? "Infusion", can answer these questions with precision and simplicity, a valued companion of the health professional. The application language (Italian / English) can be easily changed from the "menu" button on your phone. description: The app contains a database of UK legislation as well as aide memoires and other useful information. The designer of the App is a serving UK police officer. LEGISLATION The App contains over 250 articles, which are split into the following categories: ★ Assault ★ Theft ★ Criminal Damage ★ Drugs ★ Public Order ★ Anti-Social Behaviour ★ Sexual Offences ★ Traffic Law ★ Firearms ★ Immigration ★ Terrorism ★ Transport/Railways ★ Police / Courts ★ Sporting Offences ★ Animals ★ Environment ★ Use of Force ★ PACE ★ Human Rights ★ Miscellaneous Offences POINTS TO PROVE Legislation articles include the points to prove for the offence. AID MEMOIRES Handy guides that include GOWISELY, ADVOKATE, PEACE interview model, Conflict management model, Arrest Conditions, FPN codes, PND codes and more. SEARCH You can search from within the App by subject and key words that will then display all the relevant articles for your search query. EMAIL and PRINT There is also the facility to email each article so that you can then print it off – very useful for points to prove in interviews! The App contains offences from Acts of Law that apply in England and Wales (Although some of these acts also apply in Scotland and Northern Ireland).
release_text: 50 new articles have been added, including AIDE MEMOIRES ● Taped Interviews ● Special Warnings HARASSMENT ● Stalking ● Stalking - Fear of Violence IMMIGRATION ● Seize Nationality Docs ● Search - Other premises ● Evidence of Nationality TRAFFIC LAW ● Skitching ● Preliminary Breath Test ANTI-SOCIAL BEHAVIOUR ● Alcohol Confiscation ● Anti-Social Manner ● Section 27 Banning Order ENVIRONMENT ● Fly Tipping MISCELLANEOUS ● Squatting ● Racially Aggravated Offences
