How intelligent You are ? How Many Brainy Teasers Can You Take? How Many of Puzzles Can You Solve? Play with Your Mind and Prove If You're A Genius! There is a growing awareness that challenging your brain can have positive effects . Every time you challenge your brain it will modify the brain. We can indeed form new brain cells, despite a century of being told it is impossible. The game covers three major perspectives: * Logical Reasoning * Quantitative Test * General Knowledge Its entertaining mental free game consisting of best questions database. This is real good memory trainer. Exercise your brain with the most addicting Brainy test ever! As stated by the BUDHHA "There is no wealth like knowledge and no poverty like ignorance". Features: Smooth and simple User Interface Mind-boggling question sets Timer for test You can view the result's at the end of the test by using "ANSWERS" Button. !!!SHARE AND CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS BY YOUR TEST RESULTS!!! ***Enjoy this Free Mind Twister!*** ❤❤❤ If you like the app, show us your love by leaving us review! It really means a lot to us. ❤❤❤ Disclaimer: This app is supported via adds. This is a way to deliver this to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.

A family of 3D virtual assistants, each of them has their own character and a sense of humor! Meet courteous Mike and three charming girls – Mary, Brainy and Mei. They will be your friends and voice assistants. They are smart and quick-witted, and they will willingly obey to your orders, making your everyday life more comfortable. Or you can just chat with them, and they will cheer you up. What's the most important, you won't need to part with them – they will always be at hand, in your phone. App features: ★ 4 unique characters! Brainy the charming blonde, Mary the beautiful and mysterious brunette, Mei the enigmatic Chinese and courteous Mike. Every character has his own strong personality, his own disposition and sense of humor, which makes the app most resembling to a live assistant. ★ Realistic 3D graphics! Your interaction with the characters has a form of a dialog: they answer viva voce and respond when you touch them as if they were alive ★ Thanks to Wolfram Alpha, all characters can learn new skills. They also learn to understand better what you need ★ Colorful outfits and ambience! You can customize your character: to change his outfits to your liking and create an ambience that suits your mood most ★ Useful services will make your life easier than ever! Alarm clock, weather forecast, horoscope, latest news, as well as calls and SMS, reminders, notes and much more than this ★ Increased mobility due to Internet services! Mapping an optimal route using Google Maps and telling about updates in Facebook and Twitter news feeds ★ Entertainment services will not let you get bored! Your assistants will switch on your favorite music, show you most hilarious videos or tell jokes. If you feel extremely lonely, they an even play games with you! ★ They will help you with online shopping using Shoptimus or will find the best hotels offers using Smartive Hotels! It knows no equals among Android apps – JUST DOWNLOAD AND ENJOY! The app is available in English, Russian, and Spanish. French, German, Japanese and Korean to be added soon.

description: Yes, you are right! It's the very talking hamster that trolls policeman! A small talking hamster is not only a cool pal in your phone but also a true assistant. Wondering, how he could help you? It's quite simple: now slogging away poems and long texts will provide a lot of fun for you and your kids. Why so? This hamster can repeat any phrase that you say, in any language, or just any sounds that he hears, and he reproduces it in a funny voice. Recite poetry or read any text aloud, and the hamster will repeat it in its "hamster manner", and then your child will repeat it too with pleasure. Do you want to learn English or any other language together with this cute hamster? Piece of cake! Just tell him a phrase to repeat – he will repeat it, you will remember it! Make haste, download this free app now!! Hamster the copycat is anxious for fixing himself in your phone. He will surely steal a way into your heart as well as your kids'. IN ADDITION, DON'T FORGET!! THIS HAMSTER WILL TROLL EVERYBODY!

“Learn Portuguese” contains over 800 commonly-used Portuguese phrases and vocabularies for travelers and beginners. Using this app, you can learn from our Portuguese speaking parrot. The parrot works together with you to practice your speaking and listening skills, wherever and whenever you are. Learning Portuguese can never be easier.

description: Reddit for DashClock is an extension for DashClock that let's you see your inbox and comment notifications on your lockscreen. Reddit for DashClock requires DashClock Widget by Roman Nurik: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock Icon by http://www.aha-soft.com/
release_text: 1.0.2 Added support for pro app versions Added donations by in-app billing 1.0.1 Added network available check before doing any operations Added preference to always show counts even if there are no new messages Added preference to include karma counts Added preference to choose and launch a preferred Reddit app Added backup service to backup/restore preferences Added BILLING permission for potentially donation options

description: QuickTweets for DashClock (formerly known as DashClock Twitter Extension) is a Twitter based extension for DashClock Widget. It displays the latest tweets/direct messages that are sent to you or it shows the latest tweets from a specified twitter account. Currently tweets/dms from the last 2 hours are displayed. In the future I plan to make this a configurable setting. QuickTweets requires DashClock Widget by Roman Nurik: http://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock Notes: The twitter api requires you to login in to Twitter even if you only want to see public tweets from other accounts. Please make sure that you login through the extension settings. Currently when configured to display your tweets, it only displays tweets(mentions) or DMs from other users that have been sent to you. Future Features Option to only show tweets since the last update More configuration options for display and actions Choice of Twitter app to open
release_text: v1.0.4 Added preference to configure what shows (tweets, mentions, dms) Added Changelog v1.0.3 Renamed app to QuickTweets. Reduced app size. Fixed todays issue with DMs not displaying and causing crashes. Added twitter timeline. Added About page.

description: NOTE: THIS APP IS IN NO WAY AFFILIATED WITH KIK THE BRAND NOR BUSINESS ENTITY, IT USES THE FREE AND PUBLIC KIK SDK'S AND API'S FOR PROVIDE ADDITIONAL EXTERNAL FUNCTIONALITY TO IT'S USERS, I REPEAT, THIS IS NOT OWNED BY KIK. FOR THOSE OF YOU LOOKING FOR "KIK" PLEASE VISIT: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kik.android&hl=en_GB 50 million users love to use KIK. Chances are that you are connected to at least a couple of them. But what if you want to meet new people? Or want to chat but have become bored of your contact list? Our Friend Finder gives you the opportunity to CONNECT WITH LIKE-MINDED PEOPLE, whether you are looking for a bit of banter or a topical debate. K Friend Finder is growing in popularity by the day. Men and women are automatically filtered, so you only speak to the people you are looking for. Features: - STAND OUT! Highlight your username to attract more messages! - Anonymous: Upload a photo. Or don’t. Use your real name. Or don’t. The choice is all yours. - Flexibility – Make yourself available for others to find, or choose new friends from our growing list of users. - Your privacy is respected. Changed your mind and want your name removed? Hold down on a name and select ‘Report’. K Friend Finder is the latest addition to the highly successful range of apps to support the popular messaging app 'KIK' Please find KIK here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kik.android&hl=en_GB This is a new service under constant development. If you have any problems please let us know – we only want to make your experience better! We would also love to know what you like about us so please get in touch… Follow us: @BroakMedia Like us: http://facebook.com/BroakenMedia Instagram: KikFriendFinder Or email us: Support@KIKFriendFinder.co.uk
release_text: # ALL NEW INTERESTS FEATURE - When posting your name, you can now add six of your interests, these will be shown under your description when people view your profile. - More integration with this is coming: Matchmaking, filtering by interests etc...! # BUG FIXES # UI UPDATES TO SUPPORT MATERIAL UI (L) # OVERHAULED POSTING SCREEN - New, more appealing design and bug fixes to boot. # NEW LOGO - We've modernised our old icon and made it fresh. Tells how it looks!

description: Attention All Passengers! Board the plane and begin your quest! With Geometry Quest you travel the world solving geometry problems that increase in difficulty with each city. Be careful not to lose all of your passports or you will have to revisit the city to gain more knowledge. Your worldly adventure will cover geometry concepts such as categorization of shapes, area, perimeter, lines, types of angles, angle measurement, volume, circumference, coordinates, symmetry and the Pythagorean Theorem. Over 190 problems from simple geometry vocabulary to middle-school level concepts. Please help support more advanced math games for kids by purchasing this app. Bugaboo Math Games wishes you a safe and educational journey! • Animated character gives hints on solving problems • Passport stamps awarded for perfect quests • Successfully solving a city unlocks the next city on the map • Covers Common Core Standards: 3MD, 3G, 4MD, 4G, 5MD, 5G, 6G, 7G, 8G • No ads • No in-app purchases or links to the web The topics covered in this geometry app include: Pythagorean's theorem, angles, shapes, area, volume, perimeter, circumference, coordinates, isosceles triangles, congruent triangles, lines of symmetry, parallel lines crossed by a transversal, slope.

description: PLEASE READ ALL DETAILS CAREFULLY Recommended for Nova/Apex launchers - Grid Size - 6X5 Dock - Disabled Horiaontal Margin - None Vertical Margin - None You MUST have UCCW 2.1.2 or higher installed on your device or this skin WILL NOT work. MAIN WIDGET (4x3) Shows Time, Date, Location, Todays Weather (left icon), Tomorrows Weather (right icon) and Current Condition Colours of text and shapes can be edited. Unfortunately the colour of the weather icons cannot be changed :o( Six hotspots available MIDDLE WIDGET (4x1) Shows notification counts for Phone, Messaging and Gmail Colours of all shapes and the icons can be changed. The icons are Static Text 1, 2 & 3. Phone - Static Text 1 Messaging - Static Text 2 Gmail - Static Text 3 Four hotspots available BOTTOM LEFT WIDGET (2x2) Can show three apps of your choice. Change the Text and hotspot to whatever app you want. Colours of shapes can also be changed BOTTOM MIDDLE WIDGET (1X2) Shows battery level. Three hotspots available at the bottom, middle and top. Bottom hotspot is set as app drawer (nova) as default and middle and top hotspots are set as Open UCCW Editor. These can be changed to whatever you want BOTTOM RIGHT WIDGET (2x2) Can show three apps of your choice. Change the Text and hotspot to whatever app you want. Colours of shapes can also be changed Main Panel & Middle Panel have a hotspot at the bottom right hand corner set as Open UCCW Editor for easy access to customisation. To change colours/text/hotspots for the bottom panels you will need to disable hotspot mode via UCCW and then tap on the widgets to access UCCW editor ****This skin will only appear in UCCW after you place a widget on your homescreen. It does not appear in your app drawer or if you open UCCW from your app drawer**** Adding skin to your homescreen 1. Add a UCCW widget to your homescreen by long pressing the homescreen or browsing widgets in app drawer 2. Select one of the Panel widgets from UCCW menu 3. Resize before hitting "Touch Here" (This is so that the Hotspots will be correctly aligned) 4. Hit "Touch Here" to load the skin If you have any problems or queries please do not hesitate to email me Enjoy and thank you :o)

description: A collection of six AndyDroid widgets for your homescreen AndyDroid & AndyDroidPlus AndyDroid consists of two skins AndyHolo (Pic 1) & AndySolid (Pic 2). AndyDroidPlus consists of two skins AndyHoloPlus (Pic 3) & AndySolidPlus (Pic 4). And now with a Solid Shaded version for a 3D effect :o) (Pic 5) You must have the latest version of Zooper Widget Pro (2.40) to use this...... http://goo.gl/TJv3Nj FEATURES AndyHolo and AndySolid have four transparent rectangles on the body for use as hotspots (See layout in Zooper) Each module can be set to open an app or access a shortcut AndyHoloPlus and AndySolidPlus have been setup as follows - Left Arm & Time Modules - Open Alarm Clock Weather icon Module - Update widget Weekday Module - Open Calendar App Temperature Module - Open Editor Window Right Arm & Battery Bar Modules - Open Battery settings Phone Icon Module - Open Phone app SMS Icon Module - Open Messaging App Left Antenna Module - Open WiFi Settings right Antenna Module - Open Bluetooth Settings You can change these to whatever you want. Change the colour of each module to suit your homescreen/wallpaper/icons etc if you use these widgets on a tablet set the Phone/Text icons and counts to transparent DO NOT EDIT Modules - Please DO NOT EDIT these in any way as they will ruin the look of the widgets DO NOT adjust the location or size of the shapes which make up the Arms, Head, Body etc of the widgets ADDING WIDGET TO HOMESCREEN - See Pictures 1. Longpress homescreen or browse though widgets in App Drawer 2. Select Zooper Widget Pro 4x4 3. Resize widget on homescreen and then tap on it 4. When Zooper loads, select "AndyDroidZooper" 5. Choose one of the AndyDroid Widgets 6. When loaded, rescale if needed and then hit Home or Back Key 7. Enjoy :o) If you have any problems or queries please do not hesitate to email me instead of leaving negative comments/ratings Enjoy and thank you :o) Circle me on Google+ for more Bacon - http://goo.gl/BqSybX
release_text: V1.6 - Removed modules made using an outline rect in a bid to reduce poor rendering :-)

description: A Google Now themed set of homescreen skins for use with Zooper Widget Pro. Pack contains nine skins in white, nine Android L "Material" style white and nine "inverted" versions and 1x1 widgets for use as shortcuts The nine skins included are two Calendar, Weather, Home, Music, Apps, two Location & System Recommended for use with third party launchers like Nova, Apex, SSLauncher etc only You will need Media Utilities to use the Music Screen - http://goo.gl/KBEo7q Wallpapers can be found here - http://goo.gl/MeoIxu IF FONTS DON'T SHOW, OPEN APP DRAWER AND TAP ICON - NOW FOR ZOOPER - FIX ASSETS MISSING FONTS? Download them here https://www.dropbox.com/sh/sxwn1bqnko1qubc/AADsWEpk9vp_rT8iT6KL_b85a Icons can be changed by editing the "Enter text manually" module and selecting the appropriate font 1, 2 or 3 =====Features===== Calendar Skin - Todays Date - Countdown to next event - Displays Next Four Events - Date, Title & Time - Search Bar Text - Shortcut to create event - Search Bar Icon - Shortcut to Calendar App Weather Skin - Location - Current Condition - Current Temp - Wind Speed - Humidity - Weather and Hi/Lo Temp for next three days - Search Bar Icon - Refresh Widget Home Skin - Todays Date & Time - Details of Next Calendar Event - Title, Location, Date & Time - Day and Time of Next Alarm - Shortcuts to Four Apps - Phone, SMS, Email, App Drawer - Icons and shortcuts can be changed to suit your needs - Search Bar Text - Shortcut to Google Text Search - Search Bar Icon - Shortcut to Google Voice Search - Hidden Text will appear when you have a missed Call(s), SMS Message(s) or Email(s) Music Skin - Displays Track Artist, Track Title & Track Album - Displays Track Time Elapsed & Remaining with Progress Bar - Play/Pause & Next/Previous Controls - Search Bar Icon - Shortcut to Music App Applications Skin - Four Rows of Four Apps - Each Row is categorized - Google, Social, Utility, Favourites - App Categories and Icons can be changed to suit your needs System Skin - Displays Battery Level, Temp & Voltage - Icon is shortcut to Battery Stats - Storage Total/Used/Free - Icon is Shortcut to Storage Setting - RAM Total/Used/Free - Icon is Shortcut to Apps Settings - CPU Max/Min/Current - Icon is Shortcut to Running Services - Four Settings shortcuts at the bottom for Wifi, Bluetooth, Display & Sync - Icons and shortcuts can be changed to suit your needs ===Setting up the Widgets=== WATCH VIDEO FOR GUIDE It is recommended you are using Nova, Apex or a similar Launcher Open Launcher settings Desktop - Desktop Grid - 9x5 - Width Margin - None - Height Margin - None - Home screens - 5 (Or six if you wish to use all skins) - Scroll Effect - Revolving Door Dock - Dock Style - Rectangle - Dock Pages - 1 - Dock Icons - 5 - Width Margin - None - Dock Height - Medium - Dock as Overlay - TICK - Small Icons, Show Divider, Infinite Scroll - DO NOT TICK Return to Homescreen Add 5 1x1 Zooper widgets along the middle of the screen, DO NOT TAP ON THEM, long press and drag them to the bottom into the dock Add a 4x4 Zooper widget and resize the width of the screen, to the very top and just down to the top of the dock (NOT THE FULL WAY TO THE BOTTOM OF THE SCREEN) SEE PICTURE 7 Tap on the far left 1x1, scroll down and select 'Now for Zooper' and select the 1x1 Calendar Widget. Tap on 'Layout', then tap on bottom rect module, then select 'Module on Tap' scroll over to shortcuts, scroll down to Nova Launcher. Select 'Jump to Page' and choose the page you wish to jump to....Page 1 Do the same with all 1x1 widgets, working from left to right, selecting 'Jump to Page' from 1 - 5 Then tap on the 4x4 widget, select 'Now For Zooper' then select which skin you want on the page If you have any questions, drop me an email Thank you and Enjoy :o) Circle me on Google+ for more Bacon - http://goo.gl/BqSybX

Follow the step-by-step instructions to create Christmas. Playing is fun and will add a lot the development of motoric skills. This puzzle game is really for all ages. Bring the bricks together and follow the color pattern. Create a christmas tree, Santa Claus, reindeer, snowman and much more! The larger pieces allow children to use the blocks with their own small hands. They will lose their imagination with these kinds of three dimensional designs. Let your creativity go and try alternative colors or add small changes. Let the youngest play and be surprised with the results. Create those elegot figures and get the real and legot figures. These games are intended to play with colorful interlocking plastic building block toys. The blocks can be assembled and connected in many ways to construct such objects as vehicles, animals, buildings and even working robots. Anything constructed can be taken apart again and the pieces can be used to make other objects. Help your child as a parent and you will be surprised how fast the children will pick up the game. Take a picture and post the creation online. Happy faces will follow and your family and friend club will enjoy. This kid puzzle needs a set of building blocks like lego or mega bloks. Start with a basic set and have fun exploring this game. The step-by-step instructions are intended to let your kids get more out of these beautiful toys. Most duplo or mega blocks come with limited instructions. These instructions will help you to get the most out of the toys. There are also alternative sets available. If you like to play with building blocks, then this puzzle game is definitely for you! Have fun with these great constructions. Features: - Easy and clean user interface - Free puzzles - Nice graphics - For all ages - Share creations on social media

description: Bigfoot News and Sightings is the app for the serious Bigfoot hunters and anyone interested in the mysterious creature known as bigfoot or Sasquatch. This app has Bigfoot news updates from all around the world as it happens. Multiple bigfoot news and stories feeds will keep you up to date and the Bigfoot search. Find out everything there is to know about bigfoot with this app and judge for yourself whether or not he exists. This app might make you a believer as it has so many others. Take a picture of bigfoot and send it to us from right inside this app. The Bigfoot camera will embed the date and time right into the picture! Send us your Bigfoot stories right through this app for other users to enjoy or read their stories! If you want to know more about Bigfoot Sightings, News and stories buy this app! -#1 Bigfoot Fan App!- -Best Bigfoot news and sightings app in the world!- -Bigfoot Hunters choice for updated bigfoot news- -"This app made me a believer!-

CAD Touch is a professional CAD solution that completely reinvents on-site drawing, giving to professionals in various core fields like architecture, engineering, real estate, home design, and more, the power to measure, draw and view their work on-site. CAD Touch is really easy to use and it's fast multitouch interface will give you the precision and flexibility that pen and paper fail to archive, finally you will have the perfect on-the-go companion for desktop software like AutoCAD™, SketchUp™ or Solidworks™ and every other DWG/DXF compatible app. CAD Touch supports every DWG (up to AutoCAD™ 2013) entities for viewing and editing as it uses industry-proof input/output DWG importers, and you can draw new lines, polylines, rectangles, circles, arcs, points (also by xyz coords), hatches, texts, smart/angular dimensions, sketches, revision clouds, raster image, ruler, move, rotate, scale, trim, delete, mirror, offset, group, explode, grips, OSNAP, line/patterns type, alignments guides, objects library, preloaded library with 20+ blocks, customizable library, info tool to query length/perimeter/area, layers, black or white background and many more features. Complete support for decimal and imperial measure units (architectural feet and inches). CAD Touch requires no internet connection, no subscription. CAD Touch is a DWG/DXF drawings 2D editor and 2D/3D viewer, you can open, share and save your work in DWG, PDF and PNG (Pro version only, available as a separate app). This free version has no limitations in tool power and is bound with five tutorials so you can easily try and learn CAD Touch in a few minutes. Free version does not open DWG files and does not save, please buy full version to save and open files. A screen size of at least 4.0" is recommended (stylus is not necessary, but is well supported by cadTouch). Please remember to close other apps before running cadTouch (to free RAM). If you like cadTouch, leave a constructive review, a positive review ensures that we develop the app with more updates and new features, if you are facing errors or bugs please contact us instead of leaving a review at support@cadtouch.com , it's important so we can fix errors, thank you.
release_text: Version 5.0.9 (minor update, not related to major CT 6.0 that is coming soon): - Fixed graphics on Android 5.x Lollipop. - Fixed Android 5 Pro version issues. - Fixed negative coordinates point input Version 5.0.1-5.0.7: - 3D visualization of DWG and DXF files. - Added hovering support for stylus, air view finger and mouse. - Landscape orientation supported on both sides. - Now supports also phones and phablets with 3,4 inches and more.

Note that Callap Caller-ID may not work well with some other caller ID solutions. ▶ You must sign in with Facebook or Google+ for the Google Plus / Facebook Sync to work ▶ CallApp international Caller ID Dailer supports Keypad T9 search for various languages: Arabic, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, English, India ▶ CallApp does not upload your phonebook to make your contact names searchable. CallApp does upload numbers from your contact book to enrich your phonebook with social information and to update you whenever you communicate with a CallApp user (the same way most other messaging apps do) Call App currently supports: Android 2.3 - Android 5.0 (up-to Kitkat & Lollipop )) iPhone version for iOS is in the works, stay tuned. Tested with the Samsung, LG & HTC 2014 devices

app_name: Hi Guess the Brand: Logo Quiz
description: Most addictive brand icon puzzles designed for you! Guess the logo in the picture, try the best trivia quiz! Can you recognize all companies’ brand logos in the images? Challenge your brain now! This is the best and most popular logo quiz game. This is a great game with tons of different famous icons. Such as Starbucks, McDonald's, Samsung, Louis Vuitton, Nike, Adidas, Coca Cola etc. It is easy to play, see the icon in the image and match the correct words for it. Don’t need to scratch the image off or anything of that sort. Play this game to enjoy no ending fun at anywhere and anytime – relaxing at home, on a plane or even when you take a break at work. Guess the perfect designed icon in the pictures now! Solve the entertaining and challenging trivia quiz puzzles, and find out how many logos can you recognize! Stuck in a hard puzzle? Take ease, if you really can’t solve the puzzle, the hints are ready to help. You just need to tap the “Reveal Letter” button to show a random correct letter, the “Remove Letters” function will help you to remove the incorrect letters. And if you want to access the next puzzle directly, you can tap the button of “Skip Puzzle”. Besides, if you already run out of the hints, you can get more free ones by watching video ads or share it to Facebook. Take acting now! Download Hi Guess the Brand and solve the amazing and addictive puzzles. Experience the funny quiz! Features: Simple to start and play, great fun! Free, no registration required. Just download to play. Easy operation! See the icon in the image and guess the word by tapping correct letters. Well-designed, challenging and most addictive brand quiz! The game is full of various famous logos are waiting for you. Solve those great puzzles, experience the ultimate fun the game brings to you! Challenge friends and enjoy the sharing fun! Bring endless fun to you and your friends at anytime, anywhere. You can play it alone when you at home, break at work, on the train or plane. You also can share it to your friends to ask for help or challenge them to find out who can recognize more or who can guess them faster. Hints are provided to help you! No need to worry about getting stuck! Can’t recognize the brand in the image? Just tap the “Reveal Letter” button to show a random correct letter, the “Remove Letters” function will help you to remove the incorrect letters for you. And if you already run out of the hints, you can get more free ones by watching video ads or share it to Facebook.

Cette application pratique et complètement gratuite vous permet de trouver les bonnes adresses parmi les 987 campings adhérents du réseau Camping Qualité. Sur les routes de France, le guide Camping Qualité est accessible en toute liberté et sans connexion Internet puisque qu’une fois l’application téléchargée, elle est disponible en mode déconnecté. Vous pouvez localiser les campings les plus proches où que vous soyez, ainsi que tous les lieux à visiter, ou rechercher un camping via le moteur de recherche, et accéder également aux disponibilités, ou encore visualiser des photos pour vous aider à faire votre choix… Vous pouvez aussi contacter le camping avec un simple clic sur son numéro de téléphone ou sur son email. Cette application vous permettra également d’obtenir l’itinéraire pour vous rendre dans le camping ou le lieu à visiter de votre choix. L’application permet également d’enregistrer vos campings préférés dans « vos favoris » ou dans le carnet d’adresses de votre téléphone pour les retrouver plus facilement. Bien d’autres fonctionnalités vous attendent encore… L'application a été réalisée par Planet Bourgogne sur commande de Camping Qualité. This practice completely free and allows you to find great places among the 987 members of the network campsites Camping Quality. On the roads of France, Camping Quality guide is available freely and without an internet connection since once the application is downloaded, it is available offline. You can locate the closest campsites where you are, and all the places to visit, or find a campsite via the search engine, and also access availability, or viewing pictures to help you make your choice ... You can also contact the site with a single click on the phone number or his email. This application will also allow you to get the route to go to camp or to visit the place of your choice. It also allows you to save your favorite campsites in "favorites" or in the address book of your phone to find them more easily. Many other features are waiting for you ... The application was made by Planet Burgundy Camping Quality control.

description: Name the logos of the most popular brands and companies, known all over the world in one of the most popular logo quizzes on Google Play, now in even better game mode! Just how well do you know the most popular logos? This app features unique game play! Look at the distorted image of a logo and solve the name of the logo by typing the available letters into the available black boxes. If it gets too hard, you can always use your hints! Use hints to solve the logos that you don’t know. Or use Facebook or Twitter integration for free, and ask your friends about any logo that you find difficult to solve. Unlock new levels – the higher the level, the harder the questions, and the harder to unlock the next level! Progressive game play also delivers free hints, which will help you complete the higher levels. Additional hints can also be EARNED through offers. We believe that paying to win in games ruins the fun, so we have eliminated the pay option. All features of the app are free. Compare your score with your friends or with public users, by using the integrated leaderboard service from the Google Play services. Test your knowledge in friendly competition! Additional information: Every day we find logos everywhere. But just how many of them can we actually name? Test yourself with the Logo Quiz! It’s completely free. Easy to play and made for all resolutions, our Logo Quiz brings fun to all devices and screen sizes! Including the new powerful high resolution devices! Plays great on tablets too! This quiz features logos from all categories; from cars to fashion, entertainment, food, industry, education, technology, transportation, sports, finance and more! All the permissions this app uses are standard and necessary for the game play, as well as for displaying the ads – this keeps the app free for anyone to use. Note: All logos shown or represented in this game are protected by copyright and/or are trademarks of their respective corporations. The logos are protected by copyright and/or trademark. The use of images in this app for use of identification qualifies as »Fair Use« under US copyright law. More levels coming soon... Check for updates!

description: The new and improved update of our popular Mediclinic Pregnancy App has arrived. Free and easy to use, it now also boasts a host of new features and tools to help parents-to-be prepare for their new arrival. From comprehensive information on mother and baby, to features that help track your progress during each stage of your pregnancy, we will be with you every step of the way. FEATURES ✔ WEEKLY UPDATES provide detailed information on both mother and baby as the pregnancy progresses. You’ll be kept informed of important milestones and notified about appointments that should be scheduled. Share function allows you to keep friends and family informed. ✔ CALENDAR keeps you informed about upcoming appointments. ✔ FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS dispel pregnancy myths and keep you well-informed with up-to-date medical expertise. ✔ WEIGHT TRACKER helps monitor mom’s growth to ensure everything is progressing as it should. ✔ WHAT TO PACK FOR YOUR HOSPITAL STAY ensures mother and baby are prepared for their big day. ✔ PHOTO TO VIDEO creates wonderful memories by capturing your growing belly and turning the images into a video of your nine month journey. (With Facebook & YouTube Sharing). ✔ CONTRACTION TIMER helps monitor your progress during labour to unsure you get to hospital when you should. ✔ CUSTOMISABLE THEMES allow you to change the look of the app. ✔ VACCINATION REMINDERS acts as a scheduler. You’ll be kept informed of important vaccines required for your baby during baby’s first year. ✔ BABY MILESTONES provide detailed information as baby grows. Allow you to track and customise your baby’s milestones for the first 12 months. ✔ POST-NATAL INFORMATION offers detailed information on both mother and baby. ✔ CUSTOMISABLE BABY PROFILE allows you to add additional babies and customise the information within the App. ✔ EXCLUSIVE PROMOTIONS AND COMPETITION UPDATES keeps you informed of available discounts, special events and competitions at Mediclinic hospitals.
release_text: The latest version of the Mediclinic Pregnancy App introduces a more dynamic and intuitive user experience for parents-to-be. Enjoy a host of new features, including: birth notifications and announcements, baby development milestones, post-natal information, vaccination reminders, multiple baby profiles, and improved mobile access to the Mediclinic Baby Programme (users can register and gain pre-admission directly from the application).

description: Download Carbon in style. Get your downloads from the new and improved donate application. Currently, only phones that are officially supported by Carbon are supported. To install the rom, we currently recommend using Rom Installer by jrummy. Downloads are handled by the app itself, and to set where it saves files to, go to settings in the navigation drawer. You may also refresh the current tab with the refresh icon in the top right, but, this will remove your current director. To cancel a download, tap the notification while downloading. Future flashing support is to come at a later date. NOTE: This app can only save to your internal SDCard on dual sdcard devices. This is because google has chosen to remove permissions for apps to write to external media. Saving anywhere but the internal SD is not officially supported, however may work for some. YMMV If you have feature requests, please email me and I will try to get them added into the app. All emails are welcome.

description: If you like this game, please purchase the full version to support us! Soldiers of glory: World War II Zombie special version! Kill Nazi Zombies! Defend your homeland! This tower defense game will present you the truly stunning European battlefield during World War II. Features: - Real weapons in World War II (Bazooka / 155mm Cannon / B-29 Bomber / kettenkrad / Volkswagen Kubelwagen / PzKpfw Panzer VI Ausf. E Tiger / Zeppelin Airship). - Reappear the Great Historical Battles in Europe during WW II. - Realistic visual effect, ultra-HD (UHD**) pictures and stunning sound effect. - RPG-like upgrading system. - 27 medals for you to achieve. - 6 different types of defending positions and air support. - Restore the European battlefields in World War II realistically. - The campaign and customized battles contain 24 challenging maps with 3 difficulty levels; 3 modes are available (3 campaign and 1 customized battles with all modes are available in the free version). **Note: for old phones, please set the graphics settings to low in order to enjoy smooth pictures. Please also note that the UHD effect of this game may not fit small-screen devices such as 240*320 phones. Please don't rate us low due to this issue. description: Do you like killing zombies? If you do, you will like this defense game! Fans of World War Z must not miss this game! The end of the day is coming! This is the last world war between human and zombies. Cities are ruined, and human are forced to hide in their last shelters. Your mission is to build turrets along the road to protect human while kill zombies! Features: - Stunning visual effects, high-resolution images and amazing sound effects. - Different from other TD games, the zombies always appear in groups in this game! You will enjoy the pleasure to kill hundreds of zombies at an instant! - Kill zombies in over 100 cities all around the world. Each city has a unique view, and the game will offer you endless fun! - 9 different types of turrets, including the gatling gun, the tesla coil, the air-defense guns, and the shockwave generator. - A wide variety of zombies, including human zombie, dog zombie, bomb zombie and even titan zombie. - 2 defense modes and 3 difficulty levels. - 3 special skills: the Space Laser, the Shockwave Bomb and the B2 bomber. - The truly original weapons in the modern war and some sci-fi elements. - The upgrading system similar to RPG. - 27 medals waiting for you to achieve! - Chance to win random items after destroying zombies. - The military ranking system. description: Enjoy the best visual effect; as good as you play on PC! This game is very similar to Zuma's Revenge and Luxor! 'Marble Blast - Zodiac Saga [Online]' is a Zuma-like (marble shoot out, match 3) game with the theme of Norse mythology. It is easy to play, but truly addictive. Your goal is to clear all the marbles before they reach the end of the path, and meanwhile, achieve Combos, Chains and Gaps as many as possible to get the highest score. #The online multiplayer mode requires Google Play Game Service and Google +. Please upgrade your Google Play Store and Google+ to the latest version.# How to play: 1. Touch the area of the screen where you want to shoot. 2. Group 3 or more identical marbles together to clear them. 3. Swap the shooting marble by touching the marble emitter. 4. Achieve Chains by clearing marbles continuously using shooting. 5. Achieve Combos by clearing marbles continuously using attracting. 6. Achieve Gaps by clearing distant marbles using shooting. 7. Get a higher score by achieving Combos, Chains and Gaps as many as possible. Features of Online Mode: 1. No need to create an additional account – Simply sign in with Google+ and play with your friends! 2. Voice Chat! - You can chat with your friends both in text and voice! 3. Challenge your friends! – Send an invitation to your friends. The game will start automatically after the invitation being accepted. 4. Try to get a higher score by achieving Combos (+2), Chains (+1) and Gaps (+3) as many as possible; the player who gets 100 score first will win the game. Features of Classic Mode: 1. Very Easy to Play - Suitable for all age groups. 2. Large variety of Beautiful Scenes - 6 different scenes with 216 well designed levels! 3. Flexible Gameplay - This game contains the gameplay of the original zuma game (Zuma's Revenge) and the Loxur series, which will offer you more fun. 4. Attractive Props - Lightning ball, multicolor ball and more interesting props are available. 5. Growing System – You may reduce the difficulty level by upgrading the marbles with coins you earned in the game. 6. Customized Levels - You can create levels all by yourself! ------------------------------ Cat Studio - We do TD right! Check out these exciting TD games by Cat Studio! ------------------------------ 【Little Commander - World War II TD】 - A TD game with very cute visual style. 【Soldiers of Glory : Modern War】 - A TD game that enemies could attack you back! 【Global Defense: Zombie War】 - Do you like killing zombies? Then you will like this defense game! 【Little Commander 2】 - the sequel of "Little Commander – World War II TD", more towers, more fun! And many more! description: Ad-free version. Follow the basic installation steps specified here: http://foobar2000controller.blogspot.com.es/p/how-to-start.html Control your remote foobar2000 with your Android device! This application needs foobar2000 working in the computer and 2 more components installed in foobar 2000. Components needed: - foo_httpcontrol - foo_playcount (optional) Features:     * Widget * Album art * Common playback controls (Play/Pause, Next/Previous song, Shuffle ON/OFF) * Control time with progress bar * Playlist function * Play from file * Manage playlist function (add new playlist, add/remove elements by browsing files) * Search function * Rate current-playing song and any song in the playlist * Queue/Dequeue elements from playlist * Advanced search method (More of the same…artist, album or rating) * Switch between playlists * Configurable shake actions * Use your device volume keys to control foobar's volume * Wake-on-LAN * Multi-server * Pause/Mute on incoming calls * Fully compatible with WaveControl (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MarksThinkTank.WaveControl) * Fully compatible with headset controls and media buttons Enjoy it!
release_text: New Features: - Added new Intents: - com.cav.foobar2000controller.PLAY. It will start playback if paused or stopped. - com.cav.foobar2000controller.PAUSE. It will pause playback if playing.

description: Volume Control+ Pro is improved version of Volume Control+ with additional features and Ad-free Volume Control+ is a volume control app that support changing control types and colors. Features Three kinds of control types - Volume dial : Feeling of analog device Buttons : Precise control Seek bars(sliders) : Quick and easy ※ If you want to know the total volume in dial control mode, turn your device into horizontal Volume control - Media, Ring, Notifications, In-call, alarm, system Mute and unmute Vibratemode setting(ring and notification) Change ringermodes - Normal, Vibrate, Silent Change colors - Red, Blue, Green, Violet, Vanilla, Ice blue, Strawberry System settings - Change ringtone - Use incoming call volume for notifications Preset(Profile) - You can make a volume preset(profile) for frequently used settings, and by using app for preset(It is available with the Pro version) can be applied quickly Homescreen widget Lock volume - 'Lock volume' prevent unwanted changing volume and ringermode (The volume will be fixed in locked state, but this application can control the volume in lock state) ※ Screen is optimized for smartphones. In tablet pc, screen may not be correct.

Thank you for your feedbacks :)

description: Questo programma in ITALIANO da informazioni ai futuri genitori in merito allo sviluppo del bambino in grembo materno. Ogni informazione fornita è di carattere generale e si riferisce ad una gravidanza che segue il suo decorso naturale, dal concepimento sino al parto. Ogni settimana vengono riportare informazioni sullo stato di crescita del bambino, passando dallo stato di embrione a quello di feto, raccontando dello sviluppo degli organi interni, degli arti, della cute, degli organi sensoriali, dei muscoli e del sistema nervoso. Nei periodi opportuni vengono date anche informazioni riguardo agli esami che la madre può sostenere, per la valutazione dello stato di crescita del bambino e della sua integrità, sempre sotto stretto consiglio del proprio medico. Questo programma non intende in alcun modo sostiutire il ruolo fondamentale ricoperto dal personale medico di propria fiducia, e deve essere considerato esclusivamente come “gioco” di accompagnamento della madre durante le 40 settimane di gravidanza. Tutte le immagini utilizzate nel software si considerano di pubblica appartenenza. Per contatti, commenti e suggerimenti scrivere a MyPregnancy2010@gmail.com Vediamo ora in quali parti si compone il programma: 1.Introduzione Al primo avvio il programma illustra brevemente il proprio contenuto e per incominciare si deve selezionare la modalità che si preferisce tra ACCOMPAGNAMENTO (le informazioni saranno fornite di settimana in settimana con l'avanzamento della gestazione, e si potranno visualizzare anche le settimante precedenti) e CONSULTAZIONE (si ha accesso libero a tutti i contenuti fin da subito). Ad ogni avvio l'applicazione partirà in modalità ACCOMPAGNAMENTO, che è quella consigliata perché la più divertente, nel senso che si può vedere il contenuto successivo solo nel momento in cui si entra nella settimana di gravidanza successiva. Come secondo passaggio si dovranno inserire anche i dati nella pagina "Le mie Date". 2.Le mie date In questa schermata si deve inserire la data del primo giorno dell’ultima mestruazione, necessaria per il calcolo della data presunta del parto, del concepimento e del periodo gestazionale attuale, in settimane e giorni. Ovviamente queste informazioni devono essere inserite solo se la gravidanza è già in corso. 3. Il sesso del nascituro In questa finestra è possibile effettuare un calcolo statistico sul presunto sesso del nascituro. Inserendo la data dell’ultimo rapporto completo precedente l’ovulazione è possibile dare un valore di probabilità al sesso del nascituro, ovviamente questo risultato deve essere considerato puramente probabilistico, prendetelo come un gioco. 4 .Informazioni sulla gravidanza Una volta inseriti i dati come visto in precedenza, automaticamente il programma propone le informazioni in merito alla settimana di gravidanza in corso, riportando informazioni di carattere generale sullo sviluppo del bambino e sui cambiamenti che avvengono nella madre. Ad ogni settimana è anche associata una o più immagini / disegni / fotografie esplicative. Se si è scelta la modalità ACCOMPAGNAMENTO, durante il primo avvio del programma, sarà possibile consultare esclusivamente le informazioni relative alla settimana di gravidanza in corso ed alle settimane precedenti, è in ogni momento possibile comunque passare alla modalità CONSULTAZIONE, ed avere accesso a tutti i contenuti, impostabile alla pagina INFO del programma. Per le donne che non sono ancora gradive, in modalità ACCOMPAGNAMENTO sarà possibile visualizzare solo le informazioni relative alla Prima Settimana di gestazione, restando comunque sempre possibile cambiare modalità dalla pagina INFO. Il programma fornisce informazioni per tutte e 40 le settimane di gravidanza. This program ITALIAN from information to prospective parents about the child's development in the womb. Any information provided is of a general nature and refers to a pregnancy that follows its natural course, from conception until birth. Every week we bring information on the state of children's development, switching from the embryo to fetus, telling of the development of internal organs, limbs, skin, sensory organs, muscles and nervous system. At appropriate times are also given some information about the examinations that the mother can support for the evaluation of the child's growth and integrity, always under strict advice of your doctor. This program is not intended in any way sostiutire the fundamental role played by the medical personnel of their choice, and should only be regarded as a "game" to accompany the mother during the 40 weeks of pregnancy. All images used in the software are considered public membership. For contacts, comments and suggestions please write to MyPregnancy2010@gmail.com Let us now see what parts make up the program: 1.Introduction When you first start the program briefly describes its content and start you must select the mode you prefer among ACCOMPANYING (information will be provided from week to week with the progress of gestation, and you can also view the previous weeks) and CONSULTATION (you have free access to all the content immediately.) Each time you start the application in ACCOMPANYING start mode, which is recommended because the most fun in the sense that you can see the following contents only when you enter the next week of pregnancy. As a second step, you must also enter data in the "My Date". 2.The My dates On this screen you must enter the date of the first day of the last menstrual period, which is necessary for the calculation of the expected date of birth, conception and gestation period of the current, weeks and days. Of course, this information must be included only if the pregnancy is already underway. 3. The sex of the unborn child In this window you can perform a statistical calculation on the alleged sex of the unborn child. Inserting the date of the last report prior to ovulation, it is possible to give a probability value to the child's sex, of course, this result should be considered purely probabilistic like a game. 4. Information on pregnancy Once you have entered the data as seen above, the program automatically offers information on the current week of pregnancy in progress, bringing general information on child development and the changes occurring in the mother. Each week is also associated with one or more pictures / drawings / photographs explanatory. If you have chosen the ACCOMPANYING mode during the first start of the program, you can only see the information on the week of pregnancy and during the previous week is anytime you can still switch to consultation, and access to all content, set the Info page of the program. For women who are not pregnant, in ACCOMPANYING mode you can only view the information about the first week of gestation, remaining always possible to change the mode from the INFO page. The program provides information for all 40 weeks of pregnancy.
release_text: Ancora più informazioni su quel che accade nel vostro pancione. Miglioramento delle prestazioni.

description: Catch the Joy with your favorite Christian artists. The new online free CBN Radio app gives you access to thousands of great Christian songs. It’s one free app streaming many formats to choose from -- Praise, Country, Contemporary, Gospel, Spanish, Kids, Christmas and News. - CBN Praise, a mix of worshipful songs from today and yesterday, artists include Bethel Live, Kari Jobe and Michael W. Smith. - CBN Contemporary Hit Radio, with its huge variety of contemporary music from artists like Hillsong United, Aaron Shust, Jeremy Camp and Francesca Battistelli. - Cross Country, step into Cross Country, your place for continuous Country Hits, from artists such as Carrie Underwood, Rascal Flatts, Tim McGraw and Chris Young. - CBN Gospel, get anointed, your Gospel favorites from great artists like Tasha Cobbs, Bryan Andrew Wilson and Kiera Sheard. - Fiesta Hoy, enjoy continuous Spanish music that strengthens your life with artists such as Lillie Goodman, Alex Campos and Pescao Vivo. - Superbook Radio, upbeat and positive music for kids, they’ll love songs from the Newsboys, Switchfoot and Kerrie Roberts. - CBN News, stay informed with the latest news from a Christian perspective. - The Christmas Station, it’s a year round Christmas gift, you’ll celebrate with artists such as Manheim Steamroller, BeBe and CeCe Winans , and Bing Crosby. - Cross Country Christmas, keep the fire going with great Country Christmas music from Lady Antebellum, George Strait and Vince Gill.

Use this app as a tool to help you keep track of breast/bottle feedings. You're a new parent and you're tired and learning so much that every tool you use helps! - Keep track of your baby's breast/bottle feeding times with notes such as medications given - When feeding with a bottle, you can record the amount your baby has had - Know at a glance when last fed! - Have feeding "groups" for intermittent feeding or multiple sides. - Tap the Android Breast Feeding Tabulator App icon in the main window to take a picture with the camera and have a thumbnail picture of your baby there! - Some useful statistics can be seen in the Stats Page - Share this app with friends if you've found it helpful :-) - Set reminder for future feedings (can be turned off in Settings) Full featured, FREE, ad supported version Permissions: Internet needed to display ads Camera to take picture for thumbnail SD Card access to backup data
release_text: - Added video tutorial in help and on the Play Store - Added option to set reminder for future feedings (requested feature) - Several bugs fixed

Rack ‘em up, road warriors. Virtual Pool, the world’s best selling 3D pool simulation, is now available for Android phones and tablets. So real that we guarantee it will improve your real pool game! All the best features from the award winning PC version are included. Enjoy Virtual Pool on your Android anywhere you go! Now optimized for S4 and other 1080p devices! Games 9-Ball, 8-Ball, 6-Ball, Straight Pool, 10-Ball and Rotation. Easy to Use Interface The player interface is intuitive and a snap to use. Aim cue by using your finger to rotate left or right. Shoot by touching the cue, pull back with your finger and flick forward. The faster you move your finger the harder the cue ball is hit. Quick Play Set up and play your buddies or a computer opponent at any one of 6 different pool rooms. You get to choose! Play pool on a 4x9 championship or 3.5x7 bar table. Computer Opponents The VP Mobile computer adversaries know how to play pool! The better players can really stroke it, but luckily for you, the poor players are not any better than the sucker at your local bar. There are 128 computer opponents of varying skill levels, so you'll always have somebody to play. Play any skill level of computer opponent, from sucker to pool shark. Hit the Road Career mode starts you out as a rookie in the Garage. You're not alone, because Curly, the ultimate road player is there to guide you. Work your way through 6 different pool rooms by beating the Room Boss and earning enough cash to travel to the next room. Each room has a different player and table. As you progress in your career the competition gets tougher and tougher and the bets go up! You must beat Curly in the beach house for the big money to complete your career.

CereProc has developed the world's most advanced text to speech technology. Our voices not only sound real, they have character, making them suitable for any application that requires speech output. This voice can synthesize: * Navigation directions from Scout while driving * Accessibility information with Talkback * Twitter, Facebook and newsfeeds with iHearNetwork * Your favourite eBook from eBook reader apps * Your SMS with apps like Handcent SMS or Drive Carefully * and many other TTS-enabled apps Please note that for some applications such as Scout, we recommend installing on a device with at least a 1GHz processor. You can try the Laurent voice for yourself, in the interactive demo on CereProc's homepage: http://www.cereproc.com

Baby Nursing / Breastfeeding is a simple and intuitive app to help you keep track of your baby's nursing progress and more! ✭ Our easy-to-use timer lets you track your nursing records real-time. Simply press "Start" and "Stop"! And if you have started a timer and leave the app, you will receive a notification to remind you to stop the timer! ✭ View detailed and useful info of your nursing progress - such as the most recent nursing, daily averages and accumulative totals! We even help you calculate how much in ounces you have fed your baby! Enter how much your baby weighs either before or after feeding or enter an estimate of "ounces per minute" and we will do the calculations for you! ✭ Track your baby's growth progress! Record your baby's height, weight and head-size and we plot all those data onto a growth chart for you! ✭ Use our Diary feature to record and review the daily happenings, milestones and special moments of your baby! ✭ That's not it! By purchasing our in-app purchase features, you can track even more things for your baby!! ✭✭✭ In App Purchases ✭✭✭ ♛ Premium ♛ Our Premium in-app upgrade unlocks EVERYTHING BELOW!! At a discounted price!! ♥ Bottle ♥ Bottle upgrade allows you to track bottle feedings for your baby! Formula, breast milk, juices or anything you want to track! ♥ Diaper ♥ Diaper upgrade allows you to track diaper usage for your baby! Whether it’s dry, wet, BM or both Wet and BM! ♥ Pumping ♥ Pumping upgrade is for moms who'd like to keep track of their breast milk pumping progress! Like Nursing, you can use our simple timer to track your pumping progress in real-time! ♥ Sleeping ♥ Sleeping upgrade keeps track of sleeping times of your baby! Again, use our simple timer to track sleeping in real-time! ♥ Solids ♥ Solids upgrade keeps track of your baby's eating routine! Select from our comprehensive food list! There is also an intelligent "Recent" meal list that lists out recent keywords to speed up the selection process! Stay on top on your baby's progress and have fun!

Custom Beam is a Phase Beam/Sunbeam clone that lets you customize colors and animation angle, and many, many other settings. You can even make it useful by enabling the battery indicator feature, which changed the colors depending on your remaining battery life! Its Phase beam like never before! See features section below for a complete list! Some settings in Custom Beam require the premium upgrade, which can be accessed in the settings menu. Custom Beam is a live wallpaper, and can be set through your device's live wallpaper menu. This may be different on some devices, so please make sure to check your manual/online! Features: - phase/sun beam presets - randomize colors - select 2 background and one foreground color - change animation angle & speed - change background angle - Battery Indicator * - toggle bars & circles * - change number of shapes * - beam opacity - profiles *premium

This is the full version of Nexus Triangles Live! A live wallpaper that aims to resemble one of the default Android 4.2 Jelly Bean default wallpapers. It is highly configurable with custom color themes, sizes, and other settings. It is dynamically generated every time you turn on your device, just to keep thing fresh, all while still obeying your personal theme settings! This wallpaper also has fun transition animations and background animations, and you can change their speeds. Now you can also monitor your battery life, using the battery indicator settings. The wallpaper will fade the colors of your choice to show you how much power is left on your device. Nexus Triangles is optimized for battery life and performance, so you can use it all day without sacrificing your phone's usability! Too many great options? You can also save and load profiles, so you never have to settle for just one configuration! See the video for a closer look! Features: -> NEW! Parallax animations! -> NEW! Advanced battery themes! -> NEW! Cloud settings backup! -> NEW! Triangle outlines! -> Battery Indicator -> Save & Load profiles! -> Edit Animation speed! -> "Play" theme -> Color presets! -> Customize triangle size -> Customize colors and style -> Customize animation settings -> Now with Color Themes -> Runs fast & easy on your battery -> Receive all the updates and new features! Powered by libgdx.
